project.title: Animators Connect
project.description:
My name is King David (aka The Saint Cradle), and my project involves getting people involved in animation for web3 implementation. I want to train them to harness the power of 2d and 3d animation to create captivating and stunning visuals that only they could imagine. Turning them into the creatives they are. This also helps us plan with hosting our very own game-fi platform, which should be able to launch within 7 months to 1 year if the due diligence is done. Animations have always been an ideal way of storytelling, and I want more members to be able to share their unique stories in a way only they can. Plus, I will also introduce them to the jobs available for animators in the web3 space, which is quite a lot given how few we are currently‚Ä¶
I have created informative flyers for the tech club concerning DAO events that have been held on my campus. I have also created custom UI animations that have been used by some of my colleagues to add uniqueness to their work, a sort of easter egg if you will‚Ä¶

project.title: Africa Blockchain Community
project.description:
Africa Blockchain Community (ABC) is a pan-African Web3 initiative focused on education, community development, and innovation in Francophone Africa. We envision a continent empowered by blockchain, where thousands of young talents are trained and equipped to shape the decentralized future. Since 2024, we‚Äôve delivered high-impact bootcamps, partnered with global organizations, and launched a variety of community-driven programs to spark mass adoption and education ‚Äî all 100% free.

OBJECTIVES
Educate students and enthusiasts across Africa about blockchain, DeFi, and Web3 technologies.


Build a strong pipeline of African blockchain developers, designers, and community leaders.


Accelerate blockchain adoption through practical initiatives like workshops, bootcamps, webinars, and radio shows.


Strengthen Africa‚Äôs presence in the global Web3 movement through partnerships and ecosystem engagement.

answers.answer:
Project Summary:  
This program seeks to educate and engage at least 100 designers on the significance of 2D and 3D animation in the Web3 space. Through structured workshops, hands-on projects, and mentorship, our goal is to transition at least 20 of these designers into active animation creators for Web3 applications, NFTs, and metaverse experiences.

Project Objectives:
1. Education & Awareness: Conduct workshops that introduce designers to the role of 2D and 3D animation in Web3, covering blockchain technology, NFTs, and decentralized content creation.
2. Skill Development: Provide training on animation tools such as Blender, After Effects, and Unity, with a focus on their application in Web3 projects.
3. Practical Engagement: Organize hands-on activities where participants create and showcase animations suitable for NFT projects, decentralized gaming, and the metaverse.
4. Community & Networking: Establish a support system for designers to collaborate, share insights, and explore opportunities in the Web3 animation industry.
5. Recruitment & Retention: Aim to have at least 20 designers actively engaged in animation creation for Web3 platforms by the end of the program.

Implementation Plan:

Phase 1: Recruitment & Outreach (Month 1-2)
- Promote the program through social media, Web3 communities, and design networks.
- Host an introductory webinar to attract participants.

Phase 2: Educational Workshops (Month 3-4)
- Conduct virtual and in-person sessions on Web3 fundamentals and animation techniques.
- Bring in industry experts to discuss real-world applications and trends.

Phase 3: Hands-on Training (Month 5-6)
- Assign practical projects such as NFT animation creation, Web3 advertisements, and metaverse assets.
- Provide mentorship and feedback through industry professionals.

Phase 4: Showcase & Integration (Month 7-8)
- Host an exhibition where participants present their projects.
- Facilitate networking opportunities with Web3 companies and investors.
- Select top projects for further development and potential funding.

Expected Outcomes:
- 100 designers will gain knowledge on the importance of animation in Web3.
- 20+ designers will actively engage in animation creation for Web3 applications.
- A sustainable community of Web3 animation creators will be established.

Funding Request:
We are seeking [$Amount] to cover educational materials, mentorship fees, platform subscriptions, promotional activities, and event logistics. A detailed budget breakdown is available upon request.

Conclusion:
This initiative is designed to bridge the gap between traditional design and Web3 animation, fostering a new generation of skilled creators. Your support will enable us to educate, train, and launch designers into the evolving world of Web3 animation.

project.title: Peecrypt
project.description:
**Peecrypt** is a Web3-focused content creation initiative dedicated to simplifying blockchain, crypto, and decentralized technology through high-quality, engaging video content. By breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible formats, **Peecrypt** serves as a bridge between emerging Web3 projects and their target audiences.
With a focus on education, visibility, and adoption, **Peecrypt** collaborates with innovative Web3 brands to craft compelling narratives that resonate with both crypto natives and newcomers. Through a mix of explainer videos, project reviews, tutorials, and real-time event coverage, **Peecrypt** ensures that blockchain innovations reach the right people with clarity and impact.

**Peecrypt** has actively contributed to Web3 adoption through explanatory videos, visual onboarding sessions, engaging in-person and at major IRL events.
## Volunteered in organizing a web3 event - **CHAIN2055: The Future of Blockchain** and hosted the Red carpet show

project.title: B<>RDER/ESS TECH CLUB UNIC@L
project.description:
Project Name:
BORDERLESS UNICAL TECH CLUB
Project banner: 
 Introduction
Borderless UNICAL Tech Club is one of the many tech clubs emerging from [borderless dev hub](x.com/BorderlessDev). The Tech Club is working to pave the way for blockchain learning, community growth, and groundbreaking advancements in our university. Through hands-on onboarding experiences and peer-led learning spaces, we're making Web3 education both accessible and practical. Our mission is to guide students in Calabar into the decentralized world, creating a supportive environment where they can explore, ask questions, and grow. 
This work is important because it‚Äôs unlocking access to a rapidly growing digital economy‚Äîone that young people in places like Calabar might otherwise be left out of.
Why it matters:
Bridging the Opportunity Gap: Many students are curious about blockchain and Web3 but don‚Äôt know where to start. By offering education and hands-on experiences, you're helping them tap into global opportunities‚Äîfrom remote jobs to entrepreneurship.


Empowering the Next Generation: Instead of just consuming technology, students learn to build, innovate, and lead in the Web3 space. This gives them an opportunity to shift from just being users to creators, contributors, and even innovators in the digital economy.


Laying the Groundwork for Innovation in Africa: By nurturing Web3 literacy at the grassroots level, you're planting seeds for future startups, solutions, and movements that could shape Africa‚Äôs tech narrative.
Generally, the blockchain scene at unical is still growing, but it‚Äôs full of potential. While many students have heard about crypto or blockchain, only a small number really understand what it means or how to get involved. This is one of the reasons why borderless tech club unical is important.
Strategies to Achieve Our Goals
Raise Awareness & Educate


We‚Äôve started our awareness campaign by hosting beginner-friendly workshops and online sessions in a bid to simplify blockchain concepts.


Build Strategic Partnerships


We plan to collaborate with Web3 communities, student clubs, and companies to bring resources and opportunities.


Boost Community Engagement


Also, create mentorship systems, celebrate members' progress, and run challenges and hackathons.

Since our launch in October 2024, we've hosted events and webinars to facilitate onboarding across the web3 space.
## Physical Meetups & Onboarding Events
Watch Party for Borderless event - B<>rder/ess 3.0: Byte Onchain 
üîó https://x.com/UnicalTechClub/status/1858209388303167505
Web3 Educational Sessions to teach Web3 and blockchain fundamentals.
üîóhttps://x.com/UnicalTechClub/status/1865390924760514740
Organized a major meetup at UNICAL, onboarding 40 students 
üîó https://x.com/UnicalTechClub/status/1866792575056691532
Our goal for 2025 is to:
1. Expand Web3 education through workshops & training sessions.
2. Increase student participation in Web3 projects & hackathons.
3. Build strong partnerships with blockchain communities & companies.
4. Empower students with career opportunities in blockchain & tech.

project.title: D REASON
project.description:
My name is Jumbo Reason, and I'm deeply passionate about bridging the gap between the complex world of Web3 and the everyday individual. My journey began in 2022, a period of initial exploration, but it was in 2023, through the invaluable support of the Borderless Community that I truly grasped the transformative potential of decentralized technologies. 

In January 2024, I was privileged to be accepted into the Borderless Cipher session, an intensive three-month program designed to nurture technical talent. 

This experience was pivotal, culminating in my graduation with a foundational certification in Cybersecurity in July 2024. This achievement ignited a desire within me to empower others with knowledge about cyber threats and protective measures. I've since dedicated myself to disseminating this information through a variety of channels, including physical events, targeted training programs, and virtual outreach, as well as active participation in Twitter Spaces.


 My primary mission is twofold: to equip the public with the tools to navigate the digital landscape safely and to drive the adoption and understanding of Web3 across Africa.

https://x.com/ReasonDev/status/1815815732061708730

https://x.com/ReasonDev/status/1898720377615872223?t=s8USR7ePgYSTItVJy5cHMg&s=19
https://x.com/ReasonDev/status/1650040937127477249

My Contributions to Web3 Education:

Since 2022, I've been an active contributor to the Shardeum ecosystem. I've personally organized and hosted numerous Proof of Community meetups and events, focusing on demystifying DeFi and cryptocurrencies.

https://x.com/ReasonDev/status/1650040937127477249?t=iVFOA5x0afwhgrjDXDvD4A&s=19

https://x.com/ReasonDev/status/1737154510617751579?t=BDtBfxdoU9XnnVIQ4G7DuA&s=19


 I've also enjoyed co-hosting engaging Twitter Spaces, crafting informative threads for emerging Web3 startups, and even managing community initiatives where I introduced the concept of Web3 jobs and practical job hunting strategies.

https://x.com/ReasonDev/status/1888301036206444706


Additionally, I've delivered educational content on the fundamental principles of blockchain technology. I'm proud to say that these efforts have directly reached and impacted an estimated audience of over 2,000 individuals through events and social gatherings.

https://x.com/ReasonDev/status/1898720377615872223?t=s8USR7ePgYSTItVJy5cHMg&s=19

https://x.com/ReasonDev/status/1655826109462618112?t=H9rgNwCKd-WsXCuuvnxuIg&s=19

project.title: Let's build DAO
project.description:
LB DAO(Let‚Äôs build DAO) is **Africa‚Äôs On-Chain Intelligence Hub**, designed to **track, analyze, and provide insights on blockchain transactions and adoption trends** across the continent. Instead of directly building projects, LB DAO **collects real-time on-chain data** to help **developers, investors, and communities make informed decisions** on what to build and fund.

It acts as a **data-driven oracle** for Africa‚Äôs Web3 ecosystem, ensuring that blockchain projects are developed based on real needs rather than assumptions. Through **on-chain governance**, the DAO also enables **community-driven decision-making**, allowing Africans to shape the direction of blockchain adoption on the continent.

### **How is LB DAO Different?**

Unlike other blockchain initiatives in Africa that focus on education, policy advocacy, or direct project development, **LB DAO provides actionable on-chain intelligence.**

### **Key Functions of LB DAO:**

1. **On-Chain Data Tracking:** Analyzing **real-world transaction activity** to understand blockchain adoption in Africa.
2. **Funding Allocation Intelligence:** Helping investors and protocols identify **high-impact Web3 projects** based on data insights.
3. **Governance & Community Engagement:** Using **on-chain voting** to **prioritize and fund** projects that truly benefit African users.
4. **Developer Support & Ecosystem Growth:** Providing insights that help developers build **useful and scalable Web3 applications.**
5. **Education & Community Building:** Through **Let's Build Academy, bootcamps, hackathons, and Web3 events**, we empower African builders with the skills to develop real-world blockchain solutions.

project.title: XENON ACADEMY
project.description:
Isaac Joshua Chiroma  Pioneering Web3 Adoption & DeFi Education. 
  
My name is Isaac Joshua Chiroma, widely recognized in the Web3 ecosystem as XENONTHEKING. My journey into blockchain and cryptocurrency started as a curious learner, eager to explore the opportunities within decentralized finance (DeFi). Over time, my passion for the industry evolved into a mission not just to navigate the space but to help others find their path as well.  
This vision gave birth to XENON ACADEMY.
Since stepping into the industry, I have transitioned from learning and implementing strategies to mentoring, educating, and onboarding over 3,000 individuals into Web3. My impact extends across various sectors, including crypto education, community building, project advisory, DeFi analytics, and market insights, ensuring that more people gain the knowledge needed to participate meaningfully in the decentralized economy.  

Key Contributions & Achievements  

1. Web3 Education & Mentorship  
I believe that education is the bridge between curiosity and mastery in Web3, which is why I have dedicated my time to empowering individuals with structured training and mentorship programs.  
Crypto & DeFi Training Programs: 
Designed and delivered multiple in-depth training sessions on topics such as DeFi trading, fundamental & technical analysis, on-chain analytics, and blockchain security.

Isaac Joshua Chiroma  Pioneering Web3 Adoption & DeFi Education. 
  
My name is Isaac Joshua Chiroma, widely recognized in the Web3 ecosystem as XENONTHEKING. My journey into blockchain and cryptocurrency started as a curious learner, eager to explore the opportunities within decentralized finance (DeFi). Over time, my passion for the industry evolved into a mission not just to navigate the space but to help others find their path as well.  
This vision gave birth to XENON ACADEMY.
Since stepping into the industry, I have transitioned from learning and implementing strategies to mentoring, educating, and onboarding over 3,000 individuals into Web3. My impact extends across various sectors, including crypto education, community building, project advisory, DeFi analytics, and market insights, ensuring that more people gain the knowledge needed to participate meaningfully in the decentralized economy.

project.title: Virtual Blockchain Education Program
project.description:
Intro

My name is Adam Saheed. I am a core contributor at the Celo Africa DAO, leading university presence efforts within Nigerian universities. I have organized over 20+ university events and established more than 10 campus clubs across Nigeria.
To continue driving blockchain adoption and education within these campus clubs, I have recently been working on a  Virtual Blockchain Education Program. This initiative will be structured into different phases, with each phase lasting six (6) weeks, designed to educate students on blockchain technology, from beginners to advanced learners. I also receive support from Celo Africa DAO and am actively reaching out to more partners to expand this initiative.

Brief Overview of the Program

The Virtual Blockchain Education Program is a six-week structured course designed to introduce university students to blockchain technology and decentralized finance (DeFi). The program emphasizes practical learning, community engagement, and career development, equipping participants with essential skills to navigate the Web3 space.

This initiative will actively collaborate with ecosystem partners, feature guest speakers, and offer incentives to encourage participation and skill development.

https://photos.app.goo.gl/ikDjn5TUctdhqRJq5

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1HxMeD-Y1svkuBqY7kZAFlspIgPg5Rnin


Goals and Impact of the virtual Education program
‚úÖ Onboard & Educate New Users ‚Äì Provide foundational blockchain knowledge and hands-on experience.
 ‚úÖ Build Web3 Awareness in Universities ‚Äì Expand blockchain literacy among university students through structured education.
 ‚úÖ Develop Web3 Talent ‚Äì Identify and nurture talent for hackathons, open-source projects, and blockchain-based careers.
 ‚úÖ Sustainability & Growth ‚Äì Establish a pipeline for long-term blockchain adoption and engagement through student leaders and active university tech clubs.
 ‚úÖ  Retain Top active participants as Uni club Volunteer: The best five active participants will be selected as Celo Africa University Club Volunteer Ambassadors, ensuring continuity in blockchain education and engagement on university campuses.
‚úÖ Active builders in the Celo ecosystem


Success Metrics 

Target to add 500+  social media growth
MiniPay Adoption: Aim for 1,000+ MiniPay downloads from course participants
500+ Application submission
Certify over 300 individuals as Virtual Blockchain education graduates with NFT badges
Program Structure
üñ•Ô∏è Format: Weekly virtual classes, live Q&As, and hands-on assignments.
üìú POAP NFT: Participants receive a Blockchain Education NFT Badge upon completion.
 üí° Incentives: Weekly rewards for active participation, content creation, and quiz completions.
 üì¢ Community Engagement: Focus on integrating participants into blockchain-focused communities.
 üåç Ecosystem Collaborations: Guest speakers, mentorship, and networking opportunities.

Team
Adam - project lead  
Seyi - Social media Director 
Brian - Uganda Uni, Lead
Conclusion

This initiative, proposed to aims to create a new generation of Celo advocates, actively involved in building, promoting, and expanding the Celo ecosystem across Africa Universities and beyond.

Note: 
I am available to provide a full proposal upon request.
 üì© Contact: adamsheed93@gmail.com

answers.answer:
OUR IMPACT

We have successfully trained and mentored thousands of students in blockchain, cryptocurrency, and emerging technologies, many of whom are now actively contributing to the ecosystem as developers, traders, and innovators.

Our initiatives include high-impact bootcamps, training programs, and community-building efforts aimed at fostering a new generation of tech-savvy professionals.

We have partnered with leading blockchain firms and industry stakeholders to create free and accessible educational resources that drive adoption and skill development across Africa.

Our reach extends to universities, institutions, and tech communities, ensuring deep penetration and sustainable impact.

OUR APPROACH

We believe in education as the key to adoption, ensuring that individuals receive structured and practical training in blockchain and digital skills.

We host physical meetups, IRL events, and hackathons focused on blockchain education, networking, and real-world application.

Our bootcamps, training programs, and courses offer certificates upon completion, adding value to participants‚Äô careers and professional development.

We provide mentorship and career support, positioning our learners for success in the global tech ecosystem.

project.title: SOFE GROUP
project.description:
*ABOUT SOFE GROUP*

Sofe Group is a pioneering EduTech platform committed to driving digital education, blockchain adoption, and tech literacy across Africa. Since our inception, we have empowered over 5,000 individuals with essential Web3 and digital skills through both virtual and in-person learning experiences. Our mission is to build Africa‚Äôs future by equipping individuals with the knowledge and resources needed to thrive in the evolving tech landscape.

*OUR IMPACT*

We have successfully trained and mentored thousands of students in blockchain, cryptocurrency, and emerging technologies, many of whom are now actively contributing to the ecosystem as developers, traders, and innovators.
Our initiatives include high-impact bootcamps, training programs, and community-building efforts aimed at fostering a new generation of tech-savvy professionals.
We have partnered with leading blockchain firms and industry stakeholders to create free and accessible educational resources that drive adoption and skill development across Africa.
Our reach extends to universities, institutions, and tech communities, ensuring deep penetration and sustainable impact.

*OUR APPROACH*

We believe in education as the key to adoption, ensuring that individuals receive structured and practical training in blockchain and digital skills.
We host physical meetups, IRL events, and hackathons focused on blockchain education, networking, and real-world application.
Our bootcamps, training programs, and courses offer certificates upon completion, adding value to participants‚Äô careers and professional development.
We provide mentorship and career support, positioning our learners for success in the global tech ecosystem.

*OUR RECENT INITIATIVES*

Blockchain Career Expo: A flagship event aimed at scaling Africa‚Äôs tech manpower by connecting enthusiasts, professionals, and stakeholders.
Web3 Developer Bootcamps: Intensive training programs designed to equip developers with Solidity, Rust, and other blockchain development skills.
University Partnerships: Collaborations with academic institutions to introduce blockchain education to students across Nigeria and Africa.
Community-Led Learning: Dedicated groups and communities focused on DeFi, trading, blockchain development, and more.
Industry Partnerships: Working with international blockchain firms to facilitate learning and job placements for our graduates.

*WHY WE DO THIS*

Sofe Group is driven by the vision of a digitally empowered Africa where individuals can leverage technology for financial inclusion and economic growth. We believe that through education, mentorship, and collaboration, we can bridge the digital divide and create a future where African talents thrive in the global blockchain space.
For further details on our programs, initiatives, and impact, we will provide the necessary links and additional resources.

project.title: Bchain Africa
project.description:
Bchain Africa is a pioneering platform dedicated to promoting the adoption of blockchain technology across the continent through comprehensive Web 3.0 education. As a subsidiary of Vinatio Global Limited, the organization focuses on harnessing and nurturing talent in the blockchain space, offering scholarships, internships, and various opportunities to empower individuals. ‚Äã


With a strong commitment to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) 4 (Quality Education), 5 (Gender Equality), 8 (Decent Work and Economic Growth), and 17 (Partnerships for the Goals), Bchain Africa aims to create positive socio-economic impacts among the youth in Africa. ‚Äã

The organization has established one of the largest Web3 communities in East Africa and West africa and has collaborated with leading blockchain companies such as Aeternity, Token Minds, and Paxful. Through these efforts, Bchain Africa is fostering innovation, collaboration, and education in the Web3 space, positioning itself as a trailblazer in the continent's digital transformation.

Bchain Africa is a pioneering platform dedicated to promoting blockchain adoption across Africa through Web 3.0 education, developer support, and community engagement. As a subsidiary of Vinatio Global Limited, we focus on nurturing talent in the blockchain space by providing scholarships, internships, and opportunities to empower individuals.

Our Key Focus Areas

Bchain Academy ‚Äì A structured learning platform for individuals interested in blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Web3 technologies.

Developers Section ‚Äì A dedicated space for blockchain developers to learn, collaborate, and build decentralized applications (dApps).

Events & Hackathons ‚Äì We host blockchain hackathons, networking events, and conferences to bring together innovators and industry leaders.

Financial Conferences ‚Äì Last year, we organized the largest financial conference in Kenya, attracting over 100 blockchain enthusiasts, investors, and industry experts.

Our Strategic Partnerships
We have collaborated with leading blockchain organizations, including:
‚úÖ Aeternity
‚úÖ Token Minds
‚úÖ Paxful
‚úÖ StarkNet
‚úÖ Nodo Kenya
‚úÖ Cartesi Rollup

Our Mission & Vision
Mission: To empower Africa's youth by providing blockchain education, fostering innovation, and creating economic opportunities through Web3 technologies.

Vision: To position Africa as a global leader in blockchain adoption, driving financial inclusion, technological advancement, and economic growth through decentralized solutions. üöÄ

We remain committed to United Nations SDGs (Quality Education, Gender Equality, Decent Work & Economic Growth, and Partnerships for the Goals) to create a lasting impact on Africa‚Äôs digital transformation.

answers.answer:
I‚Äôm Rocket, a student at Obafemi Awolowo University, and I‚Äôm passionate about making Web3 more accessible through education and community support. On my campus, I‚Äôve become the go-to person for anything blockchain or Web3-related, helping fellow students both in person and online. I introduced fine art students to Web3 by guiding them through minting their first NFTs in Optimism‚Äôs We ‚ù§Ô∏è The Art contest. I also onboarded students into the ethereum.org Translatathon, helping them contribute to making Ethereum‚Äôs resources accessible to a global audience.

Outside of campus, I contribute as a moderator for ethereum.org and a volunteer guide for MetaMask and Consensys, where I assist users in understanding Web3, addressing common concerns, and ensuring a welcoming, secure community.
 
These are some of my notable impacts. 

University Onboarding: Helped onboard multiple students into Web3 through We ‚ù§Ô∏è The Art, guiding them through their first blockchain interactions.

Translation & Localization: Onboarded university students into the ethereum.org Translatathon, helping expand Ethereum‚Äôs resources to non-English speakers worldwide.

Blockchain Problem-Solving: Served as the go-to person for Web3-related issues on campus, assisting countless students in engaging with blockchain technology.

Community Support: Assisted hundreds of users across ethereum.org, MetaMask, and Consensys, ensuring they have the knowledge to navigate Web3 securely.


My mission is to bridge the gap between traditional education and Web3, making decentralized technology approachable, while empowering people to confidently engage in this growing space.

project.title: Rocket
project.description:
I'm Rocket, and I‚Äôm passionate about making Web3 safer and more accessible for everyone. As a moderator for ethereum.org and a volunteer guide for MetaMask and Consensys, I help people find their way in the space, answering questions, clearing up misconceptions, and fostering a welcoming community. I believe education is key to adoption, and I‚Äôm committed to making decentralized technology easier to understand.

I also contributed to the ethereum.org Translatathon, helping to bring Ethereum‚Äôs resources to a global audience. My mission is to break down barriers and empower more people to explore and engage with Web3 confidently, ensuring a more inclusive and informed ecosystem for the future.

project.title: Borderless  Web3 Tech Clubs in Campuses
project.description:
ABOUT B<>RDER/ESS WEB3 TECH CLUBS

The B<>rder/ess Tech Club is a strategy for growing Web3 Dev/Tech communities on Campuses.

The B<>rder/ess Tech Clubs are a decentralized community of University Student developers and web3-skilled or aspiring tech-skilled undergraduates and web3 enthusiasts pioneered by the B<>rder/ess Developers Programme and web3 Events.

Our aim is to raise Student Developers from the campuses who by the time they graduate are able to build solutions and projects.


B<>RDER/ESS TECH CLUB STRATEGY
1. Partnerships and collaborations.
2. B<>rder/ess developer program Trainings.
3. Events, Meet-Ups, Campus Tour and Hackathons.
4. Physical Hub set-ups


ü§ùPartnerships and collaborations:

We start by first partnering with various communities and associations in the School;

- Campus Fellowships
- Student Tech Clubs
- Departmental Associations
and a lot more.

In a case where there are no tech clubs in a University, we start one right away.

See a few of our partnerships: https://borderless.cryptosmartnow.io/updates#:~:text=University%20Community%20Partnerships



üë©‚Äçüè´B<>rder/ess developer program Trainings:

The primary purpose of the partnership is to train any community member interested in becoming a developer or learning a tech skill physically or virtually.

These are a few of the stats from our last Cipher Registrations.

 We received applications from over 28 Universities in Nigeria
Over 108 Students applied
 39 Females and 69 Males

Progress Report 
https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1707737634116628621?s=20



üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüë¶‚Äçüë¶üë©‚ÄçüíªEvents, Meet-Ups, Campus Tours and Hackathons:

Through these activities, we‚Äôre able to attract, educate, and inspire young people to pursue career paths in the tech space and in the web3 space.

Our last Campus tour was from October 3rd - October 17th in over 7 different campuses in the South-South.

project.title: Raising University Student Developers with Solidity
project.description:
WHAT I'VE DONE WITH OUR TRAINING

For over a year (Since June 2022), I've raised student developers in Africa who build on Arbitrum.

One of our Success Stories is Favour Ekekleme who recently became Arbitrum Ambassador in the University of Port-Harcourt.

He joined the B<>rder/ess developers program in November 2022 and has since become familiar with Solidity and the Arbitrum ecosystem so much so that he is now an ambassador.

You can check him out here
https://twitter.com/ekelemefavour1


I already have a network of University Student Developers in Nigeria who we're raising to build with Solidity, Pyteal, and much more.

I've raised devs to build on the Arbitrum using solidity, to our developer training curriculum

I've also raised Crypto enthusiasts who understand how to trade the DeFi ecosystem on Arbitrum, using wallets, Metamask, and more.

Overall, some of our training activities include:

1. Using Arbitrum - Community Activities

2. Building on Arbitrum - Developer Activities

3. Bridging in and out of the Arbitrum Network

4. dApp ideas that support Arbitrum Network


My work with my Not-for-profit's last Cipher Session Started in October and we had 20 new developers signed up to take our free Solidity course.

See our Progress Report here:
https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1707740083451723815?s=20


These programs cover a wide range of topics, including:

1. Web design & development
2. Blockchain development
3. Data science
4. Cyber Security
5. AI and robotics
6. UI/UX design
7. Product Management
8. 3D Animations, Unreal Engine

and a lot of others.


Mentorship: I pair developers with experienced mentors. These mentors provide guidance and support to help developers reach their full potential.

project.title: Emmanuel Babade
project.description:
My name is Emmanuel babade , aka Emmybabs de vav. My crypto journey began with investing in an Ai coin called $AGI presently called $AGIX, but my deep dive into web3 started in 2021.
Like many, I struggled with the complexities of blockchain and crypto until I met Pappa Musa ahmed and pastor Praise who were the people who boarded me and since then i  fully embrace Web3. Since then, I‚Äôve immersed myself as an advocate in this space.

My journey in the crypto space has been one of transformation‚Äîevolving from a curious newcomer to a Technical and Fundamental Analyst, an educator, mentor and over time, I have contributed to few projects and many different communities, taking on roles in education, community growth, and mentorship.

Quantum traders center is the current phase of my mission‚Äîbuilding a structured academic platform to train BEGINNERS and both advance people about the Web3 ecosystem. A community of contributors and passion driven people. 

KEY ROLES & CONTRIBUTIONS

# Leadership role
-	Tech lead at Borderless Tech Club Kano  
üîó https://x.com/borderless_kano/status/1883635562898428234?t=4dIcI87au6w5Yd_EbTMaQw&s=19


# Community Involvement  
-	Organizer & Speaker at Educational & Web3 Events in the Borderless community.
-	Actively sharing expertise in tech, finance, and crypto education  in the community.
-	Hosted free classes, mentoring 200+ newcomers in the community;
Example of hosted sessions:
(Input the group invite) 
    - https://t.me/c/2121121819/370/516 
    - https://t.me/c/2121121819/370/553 
# Broader Partnerships and Educational Impact
## Tutor & Mentor - CREAITZ
Delivered a 7-day advanced crypto trading class, empowering learners with DeFi and risk management skills
  See resources from this partnership below:
    - https://lu.ma/6mn83smf
    https://t.me/c/2111303359/4009/15705 
   https://t.me/c/2111303359/4009/15863

## Quantum trader center ‚Äì Community lead and Admin  
-	 I  onboard over 100+ students, guiding them through structured learning paths in cryptocurrency, DeFi, and blockchain technology.


People I Have Onboarded into Web3  

  - Nari Robert ‚Äì A DeFi specialist and airdrop hunter, who went on to become a Moderator at Borderless Tech Club Kano.  
    - https://x.com/Crypto_Boy016

  - Emmanuel Chinwenmeri Kalu ‚Äì A seasoned airdrop hunter and DeFi specialist, now working as a Community Growth Specialist.  
    - https://x.com/Wealthy1242080
Too mention a few.

CHALLENGES 

One of the biggest challenges I have faced while contributing to the crypto community is unreliable internet service, which disrupts real-time engagement during Q&A sessions, podcasts, and Twitter Spaces. These interruptions hinder knowledge-sharing, collaboration, and onboarding new members.  

Another major obstacle is the lack of high-quality gadgets. A slow system, subpar camera, and inadequate microphone make sessions frustrating and less impactful. Technical issues reduce efficiency, affecting content quality and engagement during live interactions.  

Addressing these challenges would significantly benefit the community. A stable internet connection and better equipment would ensure smooth, uninterrupted sessions, higher-quality educational content, and improved accessibility for learners. Clearer audio, sharper visuals, and seamless discussions would enhance the learning experience, empowering newcomers to navigate the crypto space effectively.  

To achieve this, investing in the right equipment is crucial. Reliable internet and high-quality gadgets will boost productivity and overall community engagement. Below are the key specifications of the equipment needed:
‚óè	LAPTOP - HP EliteBook 840 G8 Intel Core i7-1165G7 32 GB RAM 1000 GB SSD 14 inch FHD Wi-Fi 6 Windows 11 Pro
‚óè	MIC - Professional Dual Wireless Lapel Microphone.


Quantum traders center : A Comprehensive Plan  

Quantum traders center is my initiative to create a structured learning and mentorship platform for both beginners and advanced users in the crypto space. This project was inspired by my own struggles in crypto‚Äînavigating the complexities without proper guidance‚Äîand my mission to ensure that others have the support they need.  

Beginner Section ‚Äì Free 3 to 6-Month Mentorship Program  
A structured crypto education and mentorship initiative designed to onboard newcomers through:  
- Video sessions, podcasts, interactive Q&A, and practical training  
- Key topics include:  
  - Blockchain fundamentals  
  - Buying and storing cryptocurrencies  
  - Security best practices  
  - Trading basics  
  - Job opportunities in crypto  
  - Skill-building programs in both technical and non-technical roles  
- Goal ‚Äì Equip beginners with a clear roadmap and the skills to confidently navigate the crypto space.  

Advanced Section ‚Äì Market Insights, Collaboration & Professional Growth  
A dedicated community space for experienced traders, investors, and builders offering:  
- Market analysis reports, trading insights, partnership/investment opportunities, and job listings  
- Exclusive calls with industry experts  
- Weekly crypto newsletters and strategy breakdowns  
- Goal ‚Äì Provide advanced users with continuous learning, professional networking, and financial opportunities.  

Website & Community Structure  
Quantum traders center will feature an online platform divided into:  
- Beginner Resources ‚Äì Educational guides, tutorials, and structured learning paths  
- Advanced Tools ‚Äì Market reports, investment opportunities, networking forums  
- Community Engagement ‚Äì Telegram, Discord, and private membership groups  

Vision & Mission  
- Vision ‚Äì To build an accessible, community-driven learning ecosystem where individuals can navigate crypto with confidence.  
- Mission ‚Äì Provide free mentorship for 2000+ beginners yearly and a collaborative space for advanced users to grow, learn, and connect.  

Implementation Roadmap  
1. Planning ‚Äì Define goals, build a core team, and develop the content strategy.  
2. Development ‚Äì Website creation, video and podcast production, and community setup.  
3. Marketing & Growth ‚Äì Community outreach, partnerships, and social media engagement.  
4. Launch & Expansion ‚Äì Onboard users, introduce strategic partnerships, and scale the platform based on demand.  

Conclusion

My journey in the crypto space has been one of transformation‚Äîevolving from a curious newcomer to a Technical and Fundamental Analyst, an educator, mentor, and advocate for Web3 adoption. Through my contributions to various projects, training initiatives, and market insights, I have empowered thousands to navigate the industry with confidence. However, to scale my impact further and ensure seamless, high-quality educational experiences, overcoming infrastructure challenges is essential.

Quantum traders center represents the presence phase of my mission‚Äîbuilding a structured learning ecosystem that bridges the knowledge gap for both beginners and advanced users. With the right tools and support, I am committed to shaping a more informed and inclusive crypto community, where individuals are not just participants but active contributors to the future of decentralized finance.

answers.answer:
# WHO WE ARE

Alphablocks is a Web3 education community dedicated to onboarding newcomers into the blockchain and cryptocurrency space.

Through quarterly cohorts (currently in Cohort 9), we provide structured learning, educational resources, and hands-on experience in Web3.


To expand our impact, we have partnered with several university Web3 clubs, including:

- UNIZIK Blockchain Lab: https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1713087388191281658?t=MpHpNVuUyAZfsqqx_0lwhA&s=19 

- BlockchainMata (FUNAI): https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1681358375739703336?t=2NG9gfhMudHO4L9Hbribvw&s=19 

- BlockchainMinna: https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1682655240175190016?t=kXkaFH6C_9kByZ2NGjpiWw&s=19 

- Blockchain Ibadan: https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1727371703242645541?t=7REGudVSh4fbCQ5R5oysSA&s=19 

- Google Developer Student Club, UNN (GDSC UNN): https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1808412045827555575?t=eJryXbcDLWbqxUq1wr-Fqw&s=19 

- BlockchainUNN :(https://x.com/BlockchainUNN/status/1851594353757618326?t=XLlXV0x4_FUedYulM6d8tQ&s=19) 


# OUR IMPACT REPORT

# A. Quantitative Metrics (Excluding Cohort 9)

Total Participants Trained: 450+

Completion Rate: 70%

Retention Rate (Active Community Members): 60%


# B. Qualitative Metrics

Below are some testimonials from current participants and alumni:

https://x.com/lpsalmmie/status/1902311687065080043?t=rFtU24C8qe3BJhcDet1HpQ&s=19 

https://x.com/eddie_bullion/status/1902209856448159900?t=MJn7_1K7w4tNqeKT1mut8g&s=19 

https://x.com/NmesomaOdo2951/status/1901739283154719090?t=0ZSMwlleW2vdAAP_ITD4mw&s=19 
 https://x.com/ChineloNjianya/status/1900295999475622038?t=rvIhECX6NfJEjVkjamWXpQ&s=19 

https://x.com/Web3QueenMother/status/1858192841601597779?t=JMOkEXv930j3og_wJTsHdQ&s=19 

https://x.com/DominatingAmani/status/1856251590975357292?t=6ZBbCQXIGtFZ42DZPJSQjQ&s=19 

https://x.com/Web3QueenMother/status/1854664881783664646?t=92RqJa2EJVlqk9BCGe3aTw&s=19 

https://x.com/EverrCrypt/status/1848770153497903217?t=bos7fJwvG-WfhbeRdwhicw&s=19 

https://x.com/piscon_trades/status/1842628272552591825?t=NvTuvqDbgRx1vKQ2k9eojw&s=19 


# C. Cohort Learning Platform

Primary Learning Platform: Google Meet


# CONCLUSION

Alphablocks has successfully onboarded and educated over 450 individuals in Web3, many of whom have transitioned into careers or taken on active roles within the community.

Our next major initiative is to host the first-ever Alphablocks Community Meetup.

This funding would significantly reduce the financial burden, allowing us to bring our community together and further strengthen engagement.

project.title: AlphaBlocks
project.description:
AlphaBlocks is a web3 community which is committed to teaching and providing educational resources about Blockchain technology to web3 newbies. We also share some blockchain-related job opportunities and skill-related resources.

Additionally, we conduct quarterly cohort sessions on the fundamentals of blockchain technology and cryptocurrency, training over 200 participants annually.

# OUR AIM
To create more awareness and onboard more Web3 enthusiasts into the Blockchain industry in through education.

# OUR OBJECTIVES 

- Promote blockchain adoption within and beyond our community.

- Encourage the acquisition of blockchain-related skills.

- Provide valuable educational resources to our audience.

# PROBLEM STATEMENT: BRIDGING THE CRYPTOCURRENCY KNOWLEDGE GAP

- The problem:

Africa has a huge potential for cryptocurrency adoption, but many people, lack the basic knowledge needed to use digital assets.

Despite the increasing use of smartphones among young people, accessible educational resources remain scarce. This gap exposes many to scams and limits their ability to benefit from the digital economy.


- Scale of the Problem: 

The absence of comprehensive cryptocurrency education has resulted in financial losses due to scams, fraudulent schemes, and regulatory restrictions.


- Our Solution:

AlphaBlocks is addressing this issue by offering accessible, and high-quality blockchain education to newbies. Through our quarterly cohorts, we provide structured learning experiences that empower individuals to:

- Understand blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies.

- Identify and mitigate risks associated with digital assets.

- Engage confidently in the cryptocurrency space.

- Advocate for financial literacy and digital innovation within their communities.


By equipping individuals with the necessary knowledge and tools, AlphaBlocks is fostering a more informed and empowered individuals capable of leveraging web3 for economic growth and development.


# COMMUNITY PARTNERS

To expand our impact, we have partnered with several university Web3 clubs, including:

- UNIZIK Blockchain Lab: https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1713087388191281658?t=MpHpNVuUyAZfsqqx_0lwhA&s=19 

- BlockchainMata (FUNAI): https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1681358375739703336?t=2NG9gfhMudHO4L9Hbribvw&s=19 

- BlockchainMinna: https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1682655240175190016?t=kXkaFH6C_9kByZ2NGjpiWw&s=19 

- Blockchain Ibadan: https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1727371703242645541?t=7REGudVSh4fbCQ5R5oysSA&s=19 

- Google Developer Student Club, UNN (GDSC UNN): https://x.com/AlphaBlocksTech/status/1808412045827555575?t=eJryXbcDLWbqxUq1wr-Fqw&s=19 

- BlockchainUNN :(https://x.com/BlockchainUNN/status/1851594353757618326?t=XLlXV0x4_FUedYulM6d8tQ&s=19)


# SUSTAINABILITY PLAN

To ensure long-term sustainability, we plan to:

1. Support Career Growth: Provide community members with essential learning resources, including gadgets and more study materials, to aid their professional development.

2. Access to Premium Web3 Education

3. Tokenized & Incentivized Learning: Implement a learn-to-earn model using blockchain-based rewards to encourage engagement.

4. Merchandise & NFTs: Distribute branded items to enhance community visibility and marketing.

5. Organize Community Meetups: Host IRL meet ups to strengthen networking and collaboration.  (Plans are still in place for this later this year)


# SOME OF OUR CURRENT AND PAST COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES 

- Onboarding of newbies at the ongoing AlphaBlocks cohort 9.0:

answers.answer:
I am Elisha, a UGC creator, onchain video creator, creative designer, writer, and content team leader. My work blends creativity with blockchain technology to empower public goods adoption and onboard newbies into Web3 and onchain activities. Over the past three years, I‚Äôve been an active contributor to the B<>der/ess ecosystem, where I‚Äôve produced high-impact content, led teams, and co-organized events to educate and inspire communities.

In my 3+ years journey so far, here are some key achievements;

* Content Creation: Developed simplified onchain videos, visually stunning designs, and written content that simplify complex blockchain concepts, making them accessible to wider audiences.

* Events and Education: Co-hosted and sponsored events, X spaces, and meetups, reaching over 1000 young people and teaching them the basics of blockchain, public goods and web3.

* Community Leadership: Led the content team for B<>der/ess 3.0, mentoring and onboarding the next generation of onchain creators.

* Awards and Recognition: Won awards for my commitment and contributions to the Web3, public goods and B<>der/ess ecosystem.


And here are some quantitative and qualitative impact measurement report of my work;

# Quantitative Impact:

* Reach: I have created and shared content that has reached thousands of people across platforms like X (Twitter), with videos, threads, and designs gaining significant engagement.

Example: Public awareness video for Octant, a public goods funding platform, garnered over 2k views. ‚Üì
> https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1858527916151230914

* Events Hosted: I've sponsored and Co-organized multiple events, including X spaces and IRL meetups, directly impacting over 1000 participants, Accumulatively.

Example: Co-Organized an event teaching blockchain basics, to over 100 young people in IRL. ‚Üì
> https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1863514873289744778

Co-hosted an X-space teaching and guiding attendees to become good onchain and web3 creators helping to onboard more people to public goods and web3. ‚Üì
> https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1875455775486963750

over 500 people attended.

* Newbies Onboarded: Successfully onboarded and mentored numerous newbies, guiding them into the B<>der/ess, Public goods and Web3 ecosytem.

Example: Testimonials from grateful newbies. ‚Üì
> https://x.com/maze_of_Africa/status/1869943227471610240

> https://x.com/Web3_Goody/status/1875680541808455774

# Qualitative Impact:

* Education and Awareness: My content has simplified blockchain concepts, making them relatable and engaging for newbies.

Example: Curated a thread, teaching 5 ways to grow in Web3. ‚Üì
> https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1856441363774005688

Reached over 500 people.

* Community Growth: Through my leadership and mentorship, I‚Äôve helped built a more informed and engaged Web3 community, by my relevant contributions in the B<>der/ess ecosystem. 

Example: Real-life impact of my work in B<>der/ess 3.0 ‚Üì
> https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1852833159156830215

Among others.

My work has inspired and empowered individuals to participate in public goods and Web3 activities, fostering and growing the culture by onboarding numerous newbies.

answers.question: If you are a developer applying with your project, please state the B<>rder/ess Cipher Session you attended, the course and your full name. (If youre not a developer, type N/A)

answers.answer:
For 2+ years, I‚Äôve turned complex Web3 concepts into accessible, simplified content, thereby onboarding hundreds through videos, events, and open-source designs. Here‚Äôs the proof:

# Onchain Video Content & Educational Thread

* Web3 Content creation education: Spoke in a B<>der/ess X Space (https://x.com/BorderlessDev/status/1895037893757862397) teaching creators how to leverage content for Web3 impact.

* Web3 Onboarding: Authored a beginner-friendly thread teaching 5 actionable ways to grow in Web3.
(https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1856441363774005688)

* Public Goods Awareness: Created a simplified video explaining Octant, a public goods funding platform, which garnered over 2k views.
(https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1858527916151230914)

#  Live Events

* IRL Impact: sponsored and co-organized a blockchain basics workshop with over 100+ African young people in attendance.
(https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1863514873289744778)

# Design

* Organized and Taught a three days Graphic design master class in B<>der/ess, teaching participants how to create functional designs, especially in the Web3 ecosystem.
(https://x.com/BorderlessDev/status/1783176745375371273)

* Designed and curated a  beautiful meme thread consisting of about 20 memes promoting Octant and contributing to the public goods educational work at large, by spreading the culture. (https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1887415287462449495)

My activities directly amplifies Public goods awareness and education, attracting unique contributors.

answers.answer: My work is more than just content creation, it‚Äôs a catalyst for driving real, measurable impact in the Public goods and Web3 space. With this, i can escalate my work with building a more informed, engaged, and inspired community.

project.title: Bringing Newbies Onchain. Web3 Educator & Onchain Content Catalyst
project.description:
# I‚Äôm Elisha,

A UGC creator, onchain video creator, creative designer, writer, and content team leader and i blend creativity with blockchain technology to empower public goods adoption and newbies participation in Web3 and Onchain activities.

With a proven track record of producing compelling, high-impact content, My work stands at the intersection of storytelling and decentralized innovation. From captivating videos that break down complex blockchain concepts to visually stunning designs and written content that engage, inform, and inspire, My content fuels adoption, education, and community growth.

I‚Äôve actively Contributed to the B<>der/ess Ecosystem for approximately 3 years now.

* Tutored a Graphic Design Class
* Volunteered as a Designer
* Led the Content team for B<der/ess 3.0
* Onboarderd newbies, and routed them to the community. and so much more!

# My Vision:

In a rapidly evolving Web3 space, content isn‚Äôt just an asset, it‚Äôs the bridge between innovation and understanding literally anything. My mission is to dismantle barriers, making blockchain more accessible, relatable, and engaging to wider audiences through top-tier, onchain content.

# Links to Previous works, Onboarding events and X spaces:

> Public awareness video of a pubic goods funding platoform, Octant.

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1858527916151230914

> A collation of some designs i did for, a tech club onboarding event,B<>der/ess, Octant, and a Kol, Dexchad.

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1863923046601331032

> An X space i spoke on, teaching people how to stand out in tech, using content creation.

https://x.com/BorderlessDev/status/1895037893757862397

> An Event i co-hosted, branded and sponsored. we reached and taught over 100  young people, the basics of the blockchain and web3. 

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1863514873289744778

> A well curated thread for newbies, teaching them 5 ways to steadily grow in Web3.

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1856441363774005688

> Co-hosted a space teaching and guiding attendees to become good onchain and web3 creators helping to onboard more people to public goods and web3.

https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1875455775486963750

> Some Irl‚Äôs i attended preaching public goods, and giving them hands on experience via the Octant.app

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1854763472208252964

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1871276478190764158

> Led a team of designers, as a Web contributor in one of the biggest Web3 events in South-south Nigeria.

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1867106205002240369

# Awards Won

> Won Awards from B<>der/ess for my commitment and dedicated contributions to the Web3 and Public goods eco-system as a Content team lead and top tier designer

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1854230638913548680


#  Testimonial thread/post by Grateful Newbies:

https://x.com/maze_of_Africa/status/1869943227471610240

https://x.com/Web3_Goody/status/1875680541808455774

# Real Life impact of my work in B<>der/ess 3.0

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1852833159156830215

# More proof of work

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1887415287462449495

https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1885618369291853832

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1867272897271677224

# Featured in Karlagod‚Äôs Thread of Thanks (TOT)

https://x.com/_karlagod/status/1867070165512315203


# Wins from impact made in web3 and the borderless ecosystem

https://x.com/Elisha__Sunday/status/1891551314716352529

There is so much more!


# Prospective Impact

Funding would be able to help me increase, improve and Escalate my involvement in public goods awareness, By; hosting events, mini meet ups, dishing quality onboarding video content, one on one sessions with students and young people across african universities, market places and the globe at large.

> I‚Äôll be able to;

* Develop immersive onchain video content to demystify governance, funding, and community building.

* Design visually engaging materials to support/grow the public goods and b<>der/ess Web3 ecosystem.

* Actively Lead the content team to mentor and onboard the next generation of onchain content creators in the B<>der/ess Web3 Community.

I am more than a creator! I am the catalyst for content that drives real, measurable impact. I‚Äôll build a more informed, engaged, and inspired Web3 community.

With my high impact Public goods educative content in different forms, everyone must come onchain!

project.title: Glory Praise Emmanuel
project.description:
# **About**

I am Glory Praise Emmanuel, a **full-stack blockchain developer, developer relations engineer, Web3 educator, and community builder** dedicated to making Web3 technology accessible and actionable.  

My mission is to bridge the knowledge gap in Web3 by providing **high-quality educational content, mentorship, and career guidance** to aspiring developers, creatives, and entrepreneurs. When I‚Äôm not contributing to projects through code, I‚Äôm actively **mentoring, creating technical content, hosting educational sessions, and advocating for Web3 adoption**, ensuring that more people can navigate and thrive in the blockchain ecosystem.

Through **workshops, mentorship programs, speaking engagements, and social media outreach**, I have impacted hundreds of aspiring developers, creatives, and entrepreneurs in the blockchain space. By leveraging platforms like **YouTube, newsletters, Twitter Spaces, and community training programs**, I ensure that Web3 education reaches a diverse audience across Africa and beyond.

# Some Of My Contributions To The Web3 Ecosystem

### **1. Web3 Educational YouTube Channel‚ÄîFree Learning for All**

To make Web3 education more accessible, I run a **YouTube channel** dedicated to blockchain development, crypto security, and decentralized applications (dApps). Through in-depth tutorials and explainers, I break down complex Web3 concepts into digestible lessons.

- Created 30+ educational videos on blockchain fundamentals, smart contracts and blockchain development, and building dApps.
- Accumulated 31,000+ views from learners worldwide.
- Covered topics ranging from **Web3, AI, programming languages, to blockchain development**.

üîó https://www.youtube.com/@emmaglorypraise/videos

üîó¬†https://youtu.be/8tHHdbb8m3c?si=LgbE4cfQ_2bL1CG9

üîó¬†https://youtu.be/scKE-aWfgHE?si=bohBppMaG2-hBo6z

üîó¬†https://youtu.be/UC7ft26qhNA?si=Q18U4be9-HSGID7N

üîó¬†https://youtu.be/ij8vtGhJYwI?si=OADsbq6hNFkJkfd2

üîó¬†https://youtu.be/ij8vtGhJYwI?si=OADsbq6hNFkJkfd2

üîó¬†https://youtu.be/8tHHdbb8m3c?si=LgbE4cfQ_2bL1CG9

---

### **2. Web3 Weekly Newsletter ‚Äì Curating Career Opportunities & Insights**

To keep the Web3 community informed, I publish a **weekly Web3 newsletter**, sharing **educational content, job opportunities, grants, Web3 events, hackathons, bounties, bootcamps, and industry insights**. This newsletter serves as a **go-to resource** for developers, creatives, and blockchain enthusiasts looking to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving Web3 space.

- Reached 1,300+ views with weekly Web3 insights.
- Covered major Web3 opportunities across different blockchain ecosystems.

üîó [https://emmaglorypraise.substack.com/](https://emmaglorypraise.substack.com/publish/home)

üîó¬†https://emmaglorypraise.substack.com/p/weekly-digest-1b-hackathon-web3-career

üîó https://emmaglorypraise.substack.com/p/weekly-digest-300k-prize-pool-ai

üîó https://emmaglorypraise.substack.com/p/weekly-digest-earn-learn-and-create

üîó https://emmaglorypraise.substack.com/p/weekly-digest-last-call-for-the-month

---

### **3. Web3 Training Programs & Workshops ‚Äì Hands-on Blockchain Education**

I have organized and facilitated **technical training programs and workshops** for Web3 developers in partnership with leading blockchain communities, including **Web3Bridge, Web3Ladies, Borderless,**  **Diamund Labs, etc**

Through these workshops, I have trained **hundreds of developers**, equipping them with skills in:

- **Solidity & Smart Contract Development**
- **Web3 DApp & Frontend Development and Integrations**

üîó [https://www.linkedin.com/posts/emmaglorypraise_web3-tech-speaker-activity-7275918606545076226-NNqT](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/emmaglorypraise_web3-tech-speaker-activity-7275918606545076226-NNqT?utm_source=social_share_send&utm_medium=member_desktop_web&rcm=ACoAACpBsjUBHN7A14rEAiflEaJCSHQDjprR_9U)

üîó¬†[https://www.linkedin.com/posts/emmaglorypraise_thanksgivingwithglorypraise-31daysofgratitude-activity-7272143113266049024-jWo1](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/emmaglorypraise_thanksgivingwithglorypraise-31daysofgratitude-activity-7272143113266049024-jWo1?utm_source=social_share_send&utm_medium=member_desktop_web&rcm=ACoAACpBsjUBHN7A14rEAiflEaJCSHQDjprR_9U)

---

### **4. Web3 Speaking Engagements ‚Äì Demystifying Blockchain Technology**

I am an active **Web3 speaker**, participating in major conferences and events to educate, inspire, and onboard newcomers into the blockchain space. My speaking engagements focus on making Web3 more accessible and breaking down its complexities for a non-technical audience.

**Past Speaking Engagements:**

- **Web3 Lagos Conference 2024** ‚Äì Exploring Career Paths in Web3

-  **Web3 Global Conference 2024** ‚Äì The Battle for Ownership: Protecting Your Digital Assets in Web3

- **Borderless 3.0** ‚Äì 2-day Web3 Development workshop

üîó¬†[https://www.linkedin.com/posts/web3-global-conferencellc_web3globalconfafrica-activity-7254964283858423809-I_z6](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/web3-global-conferencellc_web3globalconfafrica-activity-7254964283858423809-I_z6?utm_source=social_share_send&utm_medium=member_desktop_web&rcm=ACoAACpBsjUBHN7A14rEAiflEaJCSHQDjprR_9U)

üîó¬†[https://www.linkedin.com/posts/emmaglorypraise_web3lagoscon2024-ethsafari-techspeaker-activity-7236902238391066624-PqeP](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/emmaglorypraise_web3lagoscon2024-ethsafari-techspeaker-activity-7236902238391066624-PqeP?utm_source=social_share_send&utm_medium=member_desktop_web&rcm=ACoAACpBsjUBHN7A14rEAiflEaJCSHQDjprR_9U)

üîó¬†[https://www.linkedin.com/posts/joinbloquest_bloqfest24-ugcPost-7224480207007580162-bmVd](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/joinbloquest_bloqfest24-ugcPost-7224480207007580162-bmVd?utm_source=social_share_send&utm_medium=member_desktop_web&rcm=ACoAACpBsjUBHN7A14rEAiflEaJCSHQDjprR_9U)

üîó¬†https://www.instagram.com/p/Cr5g-FQgEs8/

üîó¬†https://www.instagram.com/p/DGONqwQtMDA/

---

### **5. Mentorship Through Communities & 0xShip ‚Äì Nurturing Web3 Talent**

I‚Äôve provided **250+ hours of mentorship** across **0xShip, Web3Bridge, Web3Ladies, Borderless, and more**, helping aspiring Web3 talents master **blockchain development, smart contracts, and career growth**.

0xShip community is a **high-accountability mentorship program I started designed** to mentor young Web3 enthusiasts effectively, guiding them through blockchain fundamentals, smart contract development, and career-building in the decentralized space. 

üîó https://bit.ly/oxshipform

üîó¬†[https://www.linkedin.com/posts/emmaglorypraise_thanksgivingwithglorypraise-31daysofgratitude-activity-7272143113266049024-jWo1](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/emmaglorypraise_thanksgivingwithglorypraise-31daysofgratitude-activity-7272143113266049024-jWo1?utm_source=social_share_send&utm_medium=member_desktop_web&rcm=ACoAACpBsjUBHN7A14rEAiflEaJCSHQDjprR_9U)

---

### **6. Technical Articles & Blogs ‚Äì Breaking Down Web3 Concepts**

As a **developer advocate and blockchain educator**, I write **in-depth technical articles** to break down complex Web3 topics, ensuring developers and enthusiasts can stay informed about the latest trends and best practices in blockchain development. My articles cover:

- **Smart Contract Security** ‚Äì Best practices and vulnerabilities to watch out for.

-  **Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs)** ‚Äì Deep dives into EIPs shaping the Ethereum ecosystem.

-  **Layer 2 Scaling Solutions** ‚Äì How L2s enhance blockchain efficiency.

- **Web3 Development Tools** ‚Äì Guides on building and deploying smart contracts.

üîó https://glorypraise.hashnode.dev/

üîó¬†https://glorypraise.hashnode.dev/understanding-the-different-layers-in-blockchain-and-how-they-work-together

üîó¬†https://glorypraise.hashnode.dev/understanding-intmax2-zkrollup-protocol-for-beginners

üîó¬†https://glorypraise.hashnode.dev/getting-started-with-react-javascript-and-tailwind-a-step-by-step-guide-for-new-developers

üîó¬†https://glorypraise.hashnode.dev/eip-3525-the-semi-fungible-token-standard

---

### **7. Monthly Web3 AMA Twitter Spaces ‚Äì Answering Key Web3 Questions**

I host **AMA (Ask Me Anything) Twitter Spaces**, where I provide direct insights into blockchain, smart contracts, and career paths in Web3. These spaces allow **newcomers and professionals** to ask questions and receive real-time answers on navigating the blockchain ecosystem.

- Hosted 2 Twitter Spaces with 100+ cumulative listeners.
- Covered topics like **career building, blockchain development strategies, and blockchain security**.
- Featured **Web3 experts and industry leaders** in discussions.

üîó https://x.com/emmaglorypraise/status/1878137397415751895

üîó¬†https://x.com/emmaglorypraise/status/1878195259525447903

---

## **Impact & Reach**

Through mentorship, training, content creation, and public speaking, I have onboarded over **1000** individuals into Web3, reached an audience of **30,000+** across platforms, helped **50+** mentees secure jobs, grants, and internships, and collaborated with leading Web3 communities to expand education and opportunities.

---

## **Why This Grant Matters**

With the Gitcoin **‚ÄúWeb3 for Universities‚Äù** grant, I will:

- Expand mentorship initiatives within 0xShip, onboarding more young African talents.

- Create more in-depth educational content (videos, courses, and training programs).

- Support Web3 student developers with resources and tools.

- Increase accessibility to blockchain knowledge for underrepresented communities.

**Support this initiative and help us scale Web3 education!**

project.title: Soll
project.description:
I am **[ib_soll](https://x.com/ib_soll)**, a **blockchain professional**, **tech contributor**,  **community builder** and  **Project Lead** of the  *Soll* *decentralized application (DApp)* ‚Äî currently in development. My mission is to make Web3 knowledge accessible, practical, and scalable for individuals, businesses, and emerging communities.
Over the past year, I‚Äôve been deeply involved in Web3 education and community-building, leading multiple onboarding initiatives through workshops, training programs, Twitter Spaces, Instagram Live sessions, and community events. 


#### How I‚Äôve Contributed to Web3 Education:
 

# 1. Web3 Events & Onboarding Sessions:
I have hosted and co-hosted multiple Twitter Spaces and Instagram Live sessions, introducing people to core Web3 concepts such as blockchain basics, decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, and DAO participation. These sessions have reached a cumulative audience of over 3000 listeners, providing accessible learning for both tech and non-tech participants.

## Speaking Engagement:
üîó https://x.com/ib_soll/status/1888300288525709781
üîó https://x.com/ib_soll/status/1817208362188333335

metadata.title: Soll
metadata.description:
I am **[ib_soll](https://x.com/ib_soll)**, a **blockchain professional**, **tech contributor**,  **community builder** and  **Project Lead** of the  *Soll* *decentralized application (DApp)* ‚Äî currently in development. My mission is to make Web3 knowledge accessible, practical, and scalable for individuals, businesses, and emerging communities.
Over the past year, I‚Äôve been deeply involved in Web3 education and community-building, leading multiple onboarding initiatives through workshops, training programs, Twitter Spaces, Instagram Live sessions, and community events. 


#### How I‚Äôve Contributed to Web3 Education:
 

# 1. Web3 Events & Onboarding Sessions:
I have hosted and co-hosted multiple Twitter Spaces and Instagram Live sessions, introducing people to core Web3 concepts such as blockchain basics, decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, and DAO participation. These sessions have reached a cumulative audience of over 3000 listeners, providing accessible learning for both tech and non-tech participants.

answers.question: Email Address

answers.answer: This is B<>rderless Tech Club, Uniport. Esther Peter is the Tech Club Lead.
answers.question: Which B<>rder/ess University Web3 Tech Club are you affiliated with and state the web3 Tech Club Leads name?

answers.answer:
Borderless Tech Club, Uniport is a subset of the B<>rder/ess Dev Hub. This club was created with the aim of training, equipping and empowering young persons in the University of Port Harcourt with Web3 Education, onboarding and in-demand Tech skills.

The Club was established in 2023 and since inception, Borderless UNIPORT, has been very instrumental in the Web3 Education of the University Students. This is the foremost Tech Club in the university when it comes to Web3 onboarding. Annually, over 20 students in Uniport graduate from our cipher sessions where they learn in demand Tech and Web3 skills which includes; Data Analysis, Smart Contract Development, Solidity, Web Development, UI/IX, Cyber Security etc.

# OUR IMPACT
As a Tech Club we have an active WhatsApp community of 240 UNIPORT Students we have onboarded into the Web3 Space. We do this via:

Hosting Virtual Onboarding Sessions on X Spaces. Here is a few links to the X Spaces we've hosted: Starting your Journey in Web3: Essential Skills and Steps for Newbies (Series): https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1817860969172721834?s=46 https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1814542287164109280?s=46

We partner with Faculties and Departments in the University to educate and onboard students to Web3 during their Orientation or other programs.

We were Live at Borderless3.0, not as Guests but we played a Host role in the event. Every Unit had a UNIPORT Member in their team. Social Media Team, Content Team, Media Team, Ushering Team, Developer Team, etc. you can name it. https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1855337402182652221?s=46

We have onboarded and trained Newbies who are now experts and are actively educating onboarding newbies into Web3. As a proof of our work, our members volunteered in Gitcoin booth, Bitsave booth, and Movement booth where they were educating and onboarding newbies to Web3: https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1855337406557245794?s=46

We won the Award of Solidity Developer of the Year and Media Unit Award with both Team Leaders emerging from our Tech Club: https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1855337449658171787?s=46

We hosted a Picnic in our Campus last year, to welcome many newbies for an unwinding session and onboarded them into Web3: https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1799532563238695000?s=46

Our Members are always Live at Tech Events where they onboard Techies to Web3: https://x.com/samuelkime5/status/1886408181238096173?s=46

We did a Web3 Tour on campus to publicize Borderless3.0 and onboarded Newbies to Web3 via Bitsave Protocol: https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1847499569682125092?s=46

We partner with other Tech Communities to volunteer, in their events, be a Speaker and to onboard Newbies into Web3. This was at @ArbitrumPH Event where our Founder educated newbies on Web3 Governance: https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1839938961445200113?s=46

We were Live at UNIPORT Parliamentary Week to Educate and onboard the Student Lawmakers on Web3: https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1816945860682342552?s=46

Our Community Members are sought after speakers and Guests in the Tech Community who also onboard newbies during their speaking engagements and most of the Speakers at Borderless3.0, are UNIPORT Students from our Tech Community: https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1839939043733250109?s=46 https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1792933465895104519?s=46

We educate students on how to leverage the opportunities in Defi, Crypto and Web3 at large. See how much @Debbie got from Pi: https://x.com/debbie_favy/status/1892551128178429992?s=46

Meet some of the students we Onboarded that are Trailing Blaizes in the Web3 field:

Nworah Gabriel, (SAGGIO) a Web2 Dev onboarded in Borderless. He is now a Smart Contract Developer and a Solidity Tutor @Borderlesshub: >https://x.com/nworahgabriel?s=21

Ekeleme Favour (Plutodev) was onboarded as a newbie, and he is currently an Arbitrum Ambassador and a Guardian at ‚ÄòSolana All Stars‚Äô: >https://x.com/ekelemefavour1?s=21

Esther Peter, a Law Student we onboarded into the Web3 Space. She's now a Web3 Educator, Creator, Social Media Manager and a Researcher: >https://x.com/estherpeter_?s=21

Stella is a Law student we onboarded to Web3 last year she is now a Virtual Assistant in the Web3 Space: >https://x.com/ma_ris_st_el_la?s=21

Jessica a Biochemistry student in the University of Port Harcourt. We onboarded her to Web3 and taught her UI/UX design during our cipher session: >https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1839938987974086989?s=46

Debbie is a Medical Student and a newbie we onboarded to Web3 last year. She's now a full-time Web3 Writer: >https://x.com/debbie_favy?s=21 recently, Debbie emerged one of the front row Winner of the ScribbleDao Writeathon contest. >https://x.com/debbie_favy/status/1902820996475765196?s=46
