project.title: BLOCKCHAIN REVOLUTION COMMUNITY
project.description:
1.0 ABOUT

Blockchain Revolution Conference is an annual event dedicated to empowering and onboarding developers, builders, and innovators into the blockchain space. Our mission is to equip them with the tools, education, and networks needed to thrive in the industry.

We have Successfully hosted the first-ever physical Blockchain Revolution Conference in Northern Nigeria at Kaduna State University (KASU) attracting over 680+ registrations and 420+ attendees. This milestone event was made possible through the support of our esteemed sponsors: Borderless, Secret Network Africa, Firo Nigeria, Superteam, Soll, CryptoMoo, and Ottochain.

Recognizing the importance of continuous education, we have hosted multiple blockchain-focused training sessions. Notably, we successfully organized our first Blockchain Revolution Bootcamp in collaboration with Creaitz, sponsored by Yellow Card, with over 300 registrations and 110 participants completing the program.

As we look ahead, we are actively preparing for Blockchain Revolution Conference 2.0 (BRC 2.0) at University of Abuja (UNIABUJA), a bigger, better, and more impactful experience designed to further shape the future of blockchain development and innovation.

2. OBJECTIVES

Empowering Startup Founders & Developers

Provide a platform for startup founders and developers to showcase their blockchain projects and innovations.
Facilitate discussions on challenges they face and offer strategic solutions to help them scale their ideas.
Connect builders with investors, mentors, and industry experts to drive real-world adoption and growth.

Enhancing Blockchain & Tech Education

Organize regular workshops, hackathons, and training sessions to deepen understanding of blockchain technology.
Offer hands-on learning experiences where participants can build real-world applications.
Provide mentorship and resources to help developers transition from learning to implementation.

Establishing Tech Hubs in Universities Across Five States in Nigeria 

 Set up five fully operational tech hubs in Universities across different states to serve as innovation centers.
Equip these hubs with internet access, development tools, and training programs to foster tech talent.


3.PROJECT SCOPE & IMPLEMENTATION
Phase 1: Securing a Space for the Tech Hub
 Partner with the university administration to allocate a dedicated space for the hub.
  Equip the hub with computers, internet access, and learning materials.
  Design an operational structure, including scheduled training programs.


Collaboration with Other Communities

Partner with existing blockchain and tech communities within the universities to expand reach and impact.
Engage with universities to promote blockchain adoption.

Training, Workshops, and Physical Meetups

Organize on-site and virtual workshops to educate participants on blockchain fundamentals, smart contracts, and real-world applications.
Conduct physical meetups to foster networking and knowledge-sharing among blockchain enthusiasts.
Host hackathons where developers can collaborate on innovative blockchain solutions, with prizes and mentorship opportunities for winners.

5. Our Achievements:

Since our inception in September 2023, we've:

1. Successfully hosted the first-ever physical Blockchain Revolution Conference in Northern Nigeria at Kaduna State University (KASU) attracting over 680+ registrations and 420+ attendees. 

https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1830535582532923415?t=nLHk1eHgcyQqXt7QrV3DCA&s=19


https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1828407794841596215?t=ee35RU91Z0RTShkEad0jEw&s=19


https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1828411037407666585?t=_ZPYQptku2F92wzM85r4Kw&s=19


2. Beyond the conference, we have built a strong ecosystem with strategic and community partners, including Felbeth, ioTex, Web3Bridge, MprofyDAO, ICT to the Kaduna State Government, BambaGlobal, Women Techmakers, Google Developer Club, Brand Times, Unizik Blockchain Lab, BlockchainFUL, Unijos Blockchain, and Mcgp Token.

https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1826122511236608217?t=4ehUmwaWHVWBef5_uGgK8Q&s=19


https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1830530902734111077?t=4ehUmwaWHVWBef5_uGgK8Q&s=19


https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1894170408405913667?t=4ehUmwaWHVWBef5_uGgK8Q&s=19


3. We successfully held our first blockchain training program, thanks to our partners Creaitz and sponsor Yellow Card. Over 300 people signed up, and 110 completed the program. Now, we're planning our next program, which will focus on marketing in the Web3 space.

https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1833447914170929332?t=11VtehACgeJ7e-Tdm9bAfA&s=19

https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1834270363724718253?t=UMo76ei0tX_0QGQ2YTB7wA&s=19


https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1834271102257783238?t=y-40160stL3J0H25TVCJLQ&s=19


https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1834635809187844518?t=ECaiWHuRtwFDX7bWpzWR6Q&s=19


4.  Provided online spaces for students to learn about Web3, tech, and blockchain.

https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1897983478878130453?t=hCTMyWKZFknuex3WSYop6Q&s=19


https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1885074446030959042?t=AO_lESIDwXF-M17bFcF9eg&s=19


https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1882751762672779381?t=yxL6WwmCW7IvUKsOU3yy0w&s=19


https://x.com/BR_Conference_/status/1851258780299735088?t=4ehUmwaWHVWBef5_uGgK8Q&s=19



4. EXPECTED OUTCOMES
A fully operational Tech Hub within the university.
At least 100+ students trained in blockchain, Web3, and general tech skills annually.
Increased student participation in local and global hackathons.
Stronger partnerships with leading blockchain communities and companies.
Support for student-led blockchain and tech startups

5. PROJECT TIMELINE
Phase
Activity
Duration

Phase 1
Secure space, set up infrastructure
2-3 months

Phase 2
Start training sessions, mentorship programs
Ongoing

Phase 3
Expand partnerships, launch startup incubator
6-12 months

6. REQUIRED RESOURCES
A dedicated space within the university.
Laptops, internet access, and training materials.
Sponsorship and funding from tech and blockchain companies.
Support from industry experts and university lecturers.

 7. Grant Request & Use of Funds:

We're seeking funding to establish a Tech hub: Blockchain Revolution Tech Hub UNIABUJA because it will  be a game-changer for students, fostering innovation, collaboration, and real-world tech skills. This hub will empower the next generation of blockchain and tech leaders.

project.title: PlutoDev
project.description:
I am Plutodev,

A blockchain professional and Tech Contributor.

Over the past year, I‚Äôve led several Web3 onboarding initiatives, ranging from workshops, training programs, and Twitter Spaces to community events and live sessions.

Project Description

ChainConnectNG is a community dedicated to onboarding and supporting developers interested in developer relations within the Web3 space.

This initiative compiles resources, efforts, and insights into a comprehensive, open-source software for Web3 developer education.

Beyond education, ChainConnectNG will provide earning opportunities for developers looking to explore the possibilities of blockchain technology. The platform will feature resources, tools, and best practices, making it easier for individuals and communities to access and adopt Web3.

What This Project Will Deliver

A Comprehensive Developer Relations Playbook

‚Ä¢ Event strategies and best practices: A detailed look at how I‚Äôve organized Web3 onboarding events, including successes and lessons learned.

‚Ä¢ Curated learning resources: A collection of Web3 tools, platforms, and educational content designed for developer onboarding.

‚Ä¢ Step-by-step onboarding guides: Practical advice for developers entering Web3, including clear instructions, common pitfalls, and suggested learning paths.

‚Ä¢ Community engagement insights: Lessons learned from building developer communities and creating engaging, high-value content.

Why This Matters for Web3 Developer Adoption

‚Ä¢	Scalability & Impact: ChainConnectNG is designed to scale beyond my individual efforts, providing a structured resource that others can use to onboard developers efficiently.

‚Ä¢	Empowering Developers: By centralizing resources for Web3 developer relations, we lower entry barriers and accelerate adoption.

‚Ä¢	Open-Source Knowledge Sharing: The project ensures that Web3 developer education remains free, accessible, and open to all.
Target Audience

‚Ä¢	Developers: Individuals interested in Web3 developer relations who want to learn, contribute, and earn rewards.

‚Ä¢	Partners: Web3 businesses, projects, and educational initiatives seeking developer engagement.
Key Features

‚Ä¢	User Accounts: Developers can create profiles to track their engagement and learning progress.

‚Ä¢	Earning Mechanism: Users earn blockchain-based rewards for active participation.

‚Ä¢	Partner Dashboard: Projects can list their initiatives and engage with developers.

‚Ä¢	Activity Tracking: A system to measure developer contributions and interactions.

‚Ä¢	Reward System: A transparent mechanism for distributing rewards based on meaningful activity.
How I‚Äôve Contributed to Web3 Education

Impact & Reach

‚Ä¢ Helped 200+ individuals transition into Web3 by providing practical knowledge on the tools and platforms that support blockchain projects.

‚Ä¢ Actively contributed to Web3 initiatives through content creation, workshops, and mentoring.

project.title: Helloruthdavid
project.description:
**Helloruthdavid** is passionate about Web3 education and onboarding, using my skills in content creation to help beginners navigate the Web3 ecosystem. Through my work, I have hosted interactive discussions, created beginner-friendly content, and contributed to onboarding initiatives that make Web3 more accessible to everyone. 

The journey into Web3 can be overwhelming for newcomers due to complex concepts, lack of beginner-friendly resources, and difficulty finding the right opportunities. This project is dedicated to simplifying Web3 for beginners by creating engaging educational content, hosting interactive spaces, and curating practical guides.
Through my work with B<>rder/ess and personal initiatives, I have successfully onboarded individuals into Web3, helping them navigate opportunities, understand blockchain fundamentals, and connect with the right communities. 
This project aims to scale these efforts, ensuring that more people, especially those from underrepresented African regions can access the knowledge and tools they need to thrive in Web3.

https://x.com/helloruthdavid/status/1861746551170691411

https://x.com/helloruthdavid/status/1894821703722614907

project.title: Decentracode
project.description:
Overview:

Decentracode is a groundbreaking initiative dedicated to onboarding African web3 builders into the blockchain ecosystem. Through a combination of residency and online programs, Decentracode empowers developers to learn, collaborate, and build decentralized applications (dApps) that solve real-world problems across Africa. By leveraging blockchain technology, Decentracode fosters innovation, financial inclusion, and technological advancement on the continent while creating a global impact.

Mission:

To empower African developers with the skills, tools, and resources needed to thrive in the web3 space, enabling them to build decentralized solutions that address Africa‚Äôs unique challenges and opportunities.

Partnerships and Collaborations

1.) In September of 2024, We collaborated with Eth Safari and made it possible for 8 builders to be part of the Eth Safari onsite hackathon thus showcasing their project builds and bringing back over $6000 in prizes into the Ugandan community.

2.) In November of 2024, we also collaborated with Base Africa to bring Base around the World to Uganda leading to one of the products built by the community to be recognized among the winning projects. https://x.com/baseafricaa/status/1849425217627541771
https://x.com/baseafricaa/status/1854630592912003353

3.) We also partnered with web3 clubs community of Kenya to support builders building on  Cartesi rollup in August of 2024.

Therefore with this Gitcoin round, we hope to be propelled further in not only onboarding developers into the web3 space but also creating the Infrastructure required for them to build impactful projects in the blockchain space.

answers.answer:
1. Web3 Watch Party & Community Engagement
In November 2024, we hosted our first Web3 watch party for Borderless 3.0, bringing together students and blockchain enthusiasts in an exciting, collaborative space. The event sparked insightful discussions on decentralized technology and laid the foundation for our mission‚Äîto make Web3 education more accessible, engaging, and community-driven.

2. Web3 Educational Sessions and Online Workshops
We created a welcoming space for students and Web3 enthusiasts to learn, ask questions, and explore blockchain fundamentals through interactive sessions on Telegram and Discord. These workshops weren‚Äôt just about theory‚Äîthey were designed to be engaging, practical, and beginner-friendly, helping participants gain a solid foundation in decentralized technology and its real-world applications.

3. Physical Meetups & Onboarding Events
We hosted a major Web3 meetup at UNICAL, where we successfully onboarded 40 students into the blockchain space. This event provided an opportunity for students to connect, learn, and take their first steps into the world of decentralized technology in a welcoming and hands-on environment.

answers.answer:
Innovative Minds ‚Äì Scaling Web3 Education & Onboarding

I am Emmanuel Esin, founder of Innovative Minds, a Web3 education initiative empowering individuals with blockchain knowledge, hands-on training, and real-world applications through Learn, Practice and Earn approached. 

With 5+ years in Web3, I have worked with Polygon, Oasis Protocol, Avalanche, Solana, Superteam, CoreDAO,Solflare Wallet,  Scenium, Plume and more as a content developer, educator, and ambassador bridging the gap between Web2 and Web3 adoption.

üìä Impact at a Glance
‚úÖ 250+ onboarded through structured tutorials, live sessions, and bootcamps.
‚úÖ 40+ developers trained in Solidity, Rust, and smart contract deployment.
‚úÖ 80+ active learners in our Telegram community.
‚úÖ 3+ educational modules published on DeFi, on-chain analytics, and interoperability.
‚úÖBootcamp, Zealy challenges & Gitcoin funding awareness driving hands-on learning.
‚úÖ Proven success stories, students turned web3 professionals such as ambassadors, developers.


üìà Why GG23?
Gitcoin mission aligns with ours: scalable, impactful Web3 education. 

With GG23 funding, we will:
üöÄ Expand our reach to 2,000+ learners globally.
üöÄ Launch Gitcoin onboarding workshops & grant awareness programs.
üöÄ Organize hackathons & developer bootcamps to accelerate blockchain adoption.

Innovative Minds is proven, scalable, and impactful, GG23 will help us take it to the next level. Let‚Äôs build the future of Web3, one learner at a time. üåçüî•

Innovative Minds 

Innovative Minds is a dynamic Web3-focused community designed to onboard individuals into blockchain, DeFi, and emerging technologies through a ‚ÄòLearn, Practice and Earn‚Äô approach. Our mission is to equip members with the knowledge, skills, and opportunities to thrive in the decentralized world‚Äîwhile earning rewards along the way.

What We Offer:
‚úÖ Education: Web3 fundamentals, why Web3 matters, and how it‚Äôs revolutionizing the internet.
‚úÖ Skill Development: Content writing, video editing, UI/UX design, KOL, community management, blockchain development , on-chain analytics & more.
‚úÖ Engagement & Networking ‚Äì Active discussions, knowledge-sharing, and direct access to experienced blockchain professionals.
‚úÖ Ambassador Gigs & Earning Opportunities ‚Äì Members get access to exclusive ambassador programs, airdrops, and bounties to monetize their Web3 journey.
‚úÖ Live Classes & Community Calls ‚Äì Interactive Google Meet sessions and discussions to break down complex blockchain concepts.
‚úÖ Growth & Collaboration ‚Äì A space for content creators, developers, and enthusiasts to connect and grow together.

Our Impact:
üí° Onboarding thousands into Web3, breaking barriers for newcomers.
üí∞ Helping members earn $1,000+ through Web3 jobs & ambassador programs.
ü§ù Building a thriving network of creators, developers & blockchain enthusiasts.
üì¢ Driving Web3 adoption through content & community engagement.
üöÄ Empowering the next generation of Web3 leaders & innovators.

Join us & be part of the future of Web3! üî•

project.title: Byte Onchain
project.description:
# Byte Onchain 

Byte Onchain is an educational and onboarding tool that guides complete beginners‚Äîwho have no prior knowledge of crypto wallets‚Äîthrough every step of getting started onchain. From setting up their first wallet to successfully making their first onchain attestations, 

Byte Onchain simplifies the entire onboarding journey in 10 Minutes.



**View Schemas Here**
https://byteonchain.xyz/schema
[![Screenshot-2025-03-18-164938.png](https://i.postimg.cc/hPtpfD01/Screenshot-2025-03-18-164938.png)](https://postimg.cc/mhKQnGJP)

Byte Dapp targets Web2 developers interested in learning about web3 technologies and building web3 tools, OSS or products.

**THE PROBLEM**

* 1. Most Web3 events lack dedicated onboarding sessions and activations, this leaves leaves newbies  just listening to speakers and not actually getting onboarded.

* 2. Most event organisers don't have a simpler way of incentivizing newbies to download wallets and interact onchain in a fun way.

* 3. Web3 courses and developer transition programs often fail to provide on-chain certifications or verifiable attestations.

*4. Existing onboarding activities lack a clear, measurable way to determine whether users have completed the process.

**THE SOLUTION**

Byteonchain.xyz makes the Web3 onboarding and educational process, such that the experience for the newbies is both;

a. Community Centric (Human)
b. Onchain Verifiable (Tech)


We used Byte Onchain to onboard over 100 attendees at 2 Campus web3 events.

Bayero University Kano Onboarding
https://x.com/_karlagod/status/1891169957641126158?t=m5aYBZYk6z3OaBRMV1ys3g&s=19

The University of Nigeria Nsukka
https://x.com/_karlagod/status/1893316079365116173



**USER JOURNEY/RATIONALE**


# STEP 1: Wallet Setup & Blockchain Interaction

Users download a Web3 wallet and add the relevant blockchain network, introducing them to wallet activity and blockchain interactions.

* Rationale: Most users won't know how to go about setting up a wallet, and this would prompt community interactions and support, onboarding booth visitations during an event.

# Download Wallet
[![Gj6-UTCb-Xs-AALx3f.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/3JsGLV8v/Gj6-UTCb-Xs-AALx3f.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/9rBz0xqm)

# Create a profile on byteonchain.xyz
[![photo-2025-03-18-20-56-38-2.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/ZKC0Sq27/photo-2025-03-18-20-56-38-2.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/xcV9G90M)

# STEP 2: Gas Fee Support for First Transactions

Users share their wallet addresses with their community to receive a small gas fee ($0.20 - $1), which enables them to sign their first blockchain transaction.

* Rationale: It's great when newbies receive their first token from a community, it's a core memory formed off-chain, and it creates a bond between the newbie and the community.

[![photo-2025-03-18-20-56-38.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/xTG0Dncv/photo-2025-03-18-20-56-38.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/D8ZV1VQ0)


# STEP 3: Community Quiz & On-Chain Attestation

Users go to the quiz secion to complete a community quiz, reinforcing their understanding of Web3 concepts or the community or event questions.

After completing the quiz, they sign an on-chain attestation, which records their score, profile, and onboarding/course details as a verifiable credential.

Rationale: Fun activity and gamified onboarding process, that gives the user an expectation.

[![photo-2025-03-18-20-56-35.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/y6gX7Y4S/photo-2025-03-18-20-56-35.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/NLtr4t0g)

[![photo-2025-03-18-20-56-37.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/pVJ8W9cr/photo-2025-03-18-20-56-37.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/6TTTzQXx)

# STEP 4: Educational Attestations & Certification

Rationale: Conclusion and Proof of Onboarding.
[![Gktd-Mw-EWo-AARWSM.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/BZ8XW6dh/Gktd-Mw-EWo-AARWSM.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/9zhWZWXT)

https://x.com/BorderlessDev/status/1894710548350009471?t=CgiJG44GoLSPGxjzCPEOKw&s=19

You can view the attestations here;

* Onboarding
https://arbitrum.easscan.org/schema/view/0xadc627b3baae8680c1e7d1f080ea5e50738e7efcc93e95a35269e6841116fffe

* Course
https://arbitrum.easscan.org/schema/view/0xe9a059a2f6cf3a119b0f8c1d5dc022711a447c7fbb94baf6ce670ca2e6faeaeb



RELEVANCE
For structured Web3 courses, users can purchase a $1 token of the deployed chain to cover gas fees and claim their certification as an on-chain verifiable attestation.

With byteonchain.xyz, Web3 onboarding is engaging, verifiable, and organized, allowing newcomers to finish the journey with tangible evidence of their learning.


## What sets us apart

Byteonchain.xyz offers a simpler, verifiable, and community-driven approach to Web3 onboarding and education. Unlike other onboarding tools, we don‚Äôt just introduce users to wallets and blockchains‚Äîwe provide a measurable, on-chain record of their learning journey. This is what sets us apart:

1. Verifiable Onboarding with On-Chain Attestations

Most competitors offer guides and tutorials but lack a way to verify whether a user actually completed onboarding.

Byteonchain.xyz tracks onboarding progress and issues on-chain attestations, ensuring users complete the necessary steps before moving forward.

2. Community-Driven Gas Fee Support

Traditional onboarding methods require users to self-fund their first blockchain transaction, which can be a barrier.

We enable communities to sponsor gas fees ($0.20 - $1) to help users complete their first transaction.

3. Integration with Web3 Events, DAOs, and Hackathons

Many onboarding platforms focus on static courses without integration into real Web3 experiences.

Byteonchain.xyz is built for live events, allowing hackathons, DAOs, and Web3 conferences to track who has successfully onboarded.

4. Simplified, Gamified Learning Process

Unlike complex courses that overwhelm beginners, our approach uses:

Step-by-step wallet and blockchain setup

Community quizzes to reinforce learning

On-chain certifications to prove completion

5. On-Chain Certifications for Courses

Many Web3 courses and learning platforms don‚Äôt provide blockchain-based proof of completion.

With Byteonchain.xyz, users can claim certifications as on-chain attestations by purchasing a $1 token to cover gas fees, making their achievements verifiable across Web3 platforms.

6. Public Goods & Open-Source Focus

While competitors often charge high fees for onboarding or certifications, we align with Public Goods principles.

Our focus is on growing Web3 participation and supporting open-source contributors, ensuring long-term ecosystem sustainability.


## Who can use byteonchain.xyz

1. Web3 Newcomers & Enthusiasts

- Individuals looking to understand blockchain, wallets, and smart contract interactions.
- Crypto-curious users who need structured onboarding rather than fragmented, complex guides.

2. University Students & Developers Transitioning to Web3

- Students and developers eager to **learn blockchain development, DeFi, and smart contracts**.
- Those transitioning from Web2 to Web3, requiring **hands-on learning and verifiable attestations**.

3. Web3 Event Organizers & Hackathon Hosts

- Web3 conferences, DAOs, and hackathons that want seamless onboarding experiences for their participants.
- Hosts looking for a structured way to track onboarding completion and issue on-chain credentials.

4. DAOs, Communities & Public Goods Projects

- Blockchain communities that want a standardized, measurable onboarding process for new members.
- DAOs and Web3 organizations looking to issue decentralized credentials to contributors and learners.

5. Web3 Education Platforms & Content Creators

- Online courses, bootcamps, and educators who want on-chain certifications for their students.
- YouTubers, bloggers, and influencers promoting Web3 adoption and seeking tools to verify learning outcomes.

6. Blockchain Networks & Ecosystem Growth Initiatives

- Protocols and L2 ecosystems aiming to increase adoption by simplifying onboarding.
- Foundations and ecosystem grants looking for scalable, impactful education tools.


## PROGRESS REPORT AND PoWs

metadata.title: Byte Onchain
metadata.description:
# Byte Onchain 

Byte Onchain is an educational and onboarding tool that guides complete beginners‚Äîwho have no prior knowledge of crypto wallets‚Äîthrough every step of getting started onchain. From setting up their first wallet to successfully making their first onchain attestations, 

Byte Onchain simplifies the entire onboarding journey in 10 Minutes.



**View Schemas Here**
https://byteonchain.xyz/schema
[![Screenshot-2025-03-18-164938.png](https://i.postimg.cc/hPtpfD01/Screenshot-2025-03-18-164938.png)](https://postimg.cc/mhKQnGJP)

Byte Dapp targets Web2 developers interested in learning about web3 technologies and building web3 tools, OSS or products.

**THE PROBLEM**

* 1. Most Web3 events lack dedicated onboarding sessions and activations, this leaves leaves newbies  just listening to speakers and not actually getting onboarded.

* 2. Most event organisers don't have a simpler way of incentivizing newbies to download wallets and interact onchain in a fun way.

* 3. Web3 courses and developer transition programs often fail to provide on-chain certifications or verifiable attestations.

* 4. Existing onboarding activities lack a clear, measurable way to determine whether users have completed the process.

**THE SOLUTION**

Byteonchain.xyz makes the Web3 onboarding and educational process, such that the experience for the newbies is both;

a. Community Centric (Human)
b. Onchain Verifiable (Tech)


We used Byte Onchain to onboard over 100 attendees at 2 Campus web3 events.

Bayero University Kano Onboarding

I am Gift Dennis, a web3  content creator and leader. Currently, I serve as the Tech Clubs Director at Borderless-a public goods at the fore front web3 education, community building and empowerment

My passion is crafting onboarding content that unlocks the gates of Web3, welcoming newcomers to this vast, uncharted territory. I'm also dedicated to guiding young visionaries who dare to establish Tech clubs in universities, empowering them to forge their own paths. Together, we cultivate growth strategies that amplify their impact, in their respective universities and the web3 ecosystem.


I intend to amplify my impact through my project "The Newbie's Dorm". To facilitate this I plan to acquire essential tools and resources that will enable me to create more engaging educational content and support a wider audience of newbies navigating the Web3 space.

Specifically, I aim to obtain:

A laptop to enhance my content creation capabilities.

High-quality microphones and lighting equipment to improve audio-visual production.

Ergonomic chairs and other necessary hardware to create a comfortable and efficient workspace.

project.title: Blockchain Gazette
project.description:
What if **blockchain news, information and education** isn‚Äôt controlled by "centralized media" but instead thrives in an open and permissionless ecosystem?

This is the future **Blockchain Gazette** is thriving for and building.



This project began as an open-source media experiment, empowering blockchain projects (such as the [DFINITY Foundation](https://x.com/Blockgazette/status/1690442696697999360), and the [Sia Foundation](https://x.com/Blockgazette/status/1765457090762461689?t=yF9pGy-Lt-S5rf2ZZvr44w&s=19)) with well-researched blockchain-based educational content in a variety of digital formats.

![Headline Image](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1gMBmfInkl.png)

Now, we intend to take the next leap: soon, we will launch a **Decentralized Media Protocol**‚Äîa permissionless framework where contributors, curators, and consumers interact seamlessly to scale blockchain education!

answers.answer:
University-Focused Blockchain Education & Community Engagement
Borderless IAUE & Borderless 3.0:
As an integral leader within the Borderless Community at Ignatius Ajuru University of Education (IAUE), I spearheaded initiatives that bring free, hands-on blockchain education directly to university campuses through interactive workshops and live events.
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1856444887870128630
Onboarding Initiatives:
I have actively contributed to onboarding efforts across multiple initiatives:
Over 1,800 individuals onboarded through Borderless 3.0 outreach.
Supported onboarding for Web3 PHC, which welcomed over 1,000 participants.
Part of the outreach team for Borderless 3.0 at Rivers State University, Port Harcourt.
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1848509826239770864

Impactful Content & Creative Outreach
Breaking Down Web3 Concepts / What da hell is Web3?:
Simplified complex Web3 terms and slang, making blockchain technology accessible.
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1857143530785026153
Award Tweet ‚Äì "Borderless has changed my life no cap":
Sharing personal impact and inspiration from the ecosystem.
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1856444887870128630
Web3 PHC Video:
A video showcasing real-world applications in the Web3 space.
Link: https://x.com/web3PHC/status/1869594360201015718
Red Carpet Host for Borderless 3.0:
Hosted interviews that connected key voices within the Web3 community.
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1852697309827449315
Directing IT Review Video for University Students:
Produced and directed content highlighting student experiences and insights in tech.
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1851770039273197870
Roqqu IAUE Event (Content Lead & Outreach):
Helped onboard over 1,000 students to the Roqqu IAUE event through dedicated outreach and leadership.
Links:
https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1884975093924688369
https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1893324652883185695
https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1892274768662987240
The Cipher Session Shoot Contribution:
Captured and celebrated student participation in blockchain projects.
Link: https://x.com/_karlagod/status/1867070104976101420
I and My Team at Web3 PHC:
Collaborated with my team at Web3 PHC to drive community engagement.
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1865995303649738853
Interview Hosting:
Interview Host for Borderless 3.0:
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1852697309827449315
Interview Host for Web3 Port Harcourt:
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1865520691635744942

Hosted Web3 Creator Space:
Conducted a session that attracted over 600 live listeners.
Link: https://x.com/AtehOfficial/status/1885618369291853832
Additional Content Contributions:
Created memes and content to onboard students through Borderless 3.0.
Directed/scripting the IT Review Video for university students (link above).

OSS Building & Collaborative Projects
Cipher Session Shoots:
Contributed to creative session shoots that capture and celebrate student engagement in blockchain applications.
Link: https://x.com/_karlagod/status/1867070104976101420
Hackathon Participation:
Took part in a Lisk Hackathon at Rivers State University of Education, fostering collaboration, innovation, and an open-source mindset.
BaseOnCampus Role:
Currently pursuing a role at IAUE to onboard students to Base, reinforcing continuous blockchain education and OSS development.
(Role details available upon request.)

Quantitative Impact
Onboarding & Outreach:
Over 1,000 students onboarded to the Roqqu IAUE event (via dedicated outreach and content leadership).
Contributed to the onboarding of over 1,800 individuals through Borderless 3.0 initiatives.
Supported the onboarding of over 1,000 participants for the Web3 PHC initiative.

Content Reach:
Lisk Hackathon and related video content reached over 4,000 views.
Tweets simplifying Web3 concepts have cumulatively garnered over 10,000 views (with some content exceeding 20,000 views).
Live Engagement:

Hosted a Web3 Creator Space that attracted over 600 live listeners.



Qualitative Impact

Empowering Students:
Provided university students with hands-on blockchain education and real-world exposure to decentralized technologies, paving the way for future career opportunities in Web3.
Community Building:
Strengthened networks within the Borderless and Public Goods ecosystems‚Äîincluding significant contributions to the Port Harcourt Web3 community‚Äîby connecting local innovators with global trends and opportunities.
Creative & Educational Excellence:
Through engaging content (interviews, memes, videos, and live sessions), I have simplified complex Web3 concepts, inspiring a diverse audience to explore and adopt decentralized technologies.
Sustainable OSS and Educational Impact:
My ongoing outreach, creative content production, and event hosting have cultivated an innovative environment on university campuses, fostering a future-ready workforce dedicated to continuous blockchain education and OSS development.
More details here: https://www.notion.so/About-Me-1bf0f5d795c080588f3ffcf6bc7fafe9

project.title: Ateh Ugoji
project.description:
I'm Ateh Ugoji, an award-winning Web3 media personnel renowned for creating compelling content that breaks down web3 Concepts in the simplest form ever. I'm building Borderless IAUE, a pioneering initiative designed to bring free, accessible Web3 education directly into the university environment. Through engaging workshops, live events, and strategic collaborations, I empower students to explore blockchain, digital assets, and the broader digital economy. My work in Web3 media,ranging from content creation for Borderless to sharing insights on my X profile further amplifies the message of innovation and inclusivity in the decentralized space.



Impact:

Educational Transformation: Equipping university students with the essential skills to navigate and shape the future digital landscape.

Community Empowerment: Fostering a vibrant ecosystem that unites students, educators, and industry experts under the shared goal of advancing Web3 knowledge.

Accessibility: Leveraging my experience and media presence to drive meaningful change, I aim to inspire and mentor the next generation of tech innovators. My content and outreach efforts are designed to break down barriers, making Web3 accessible and appealing, and ultimately creating a ripple effect of knowledge and innovation across global communities.

- Educational Content Creation:

(https://x.com/EnergySalvation), I co-hosted the Building Wealth in Web3 1.0 event, successfully onboarding many newcomers and providing them with accessible educational resources.

project.title: Cheric Leo ‚Äì Web3 Community Builder
project.description:
Introduction
I'm Okwor Deborah, also known as Cheric Leo in the Web3 space. I began my journey as a community moderator at Unizik Blockchain Lab (UBL), where I quickly immersed myself in learning and teaching Web3, blockchain, DeFi, and crypto-related topics. I played a pivotal role in growing the UBL community from 150 to over 3,000 active members. Through my leadership and dedication, I advanced from an intern community manager to a full community manager and ultimately became the Co-Lead of UBL.

Beyond UBL, I expanded my impact by joining other Web3 communities. I took on the role of Tech Club Lead for Borderless Unizik after successfully hosting the Borderless 2.0 watch party at my university. I later hosted another event for the Borderless Tech Club Unizik, themed Build on Lisk with Borderless, with over 50 students in attendance.

https://x.com/Cheric_Leo/status/1854615117423321553
https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1853825915056205896
https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1808133739660079156

Additionally, I joined Blockchain Revolution Conference (BRC) as a project manager and was later promoted to Head of Operations after successfully hosting BRC 1.0 at Kaduna University, which had over 400 students in attendance. I also became an ambassador for iPayBTC at Unizik and was later promoted to a marketing intern after hosting the first Bitcoin on Campus event in Southeast Nigeria.

https://x.com/Cheric_Leo/status/1833821876478480602
https://x.com/ipayBTCapp/status/1870852360551170182

I am committed to empowering students and young professionals with blockchain knowledge while fostering strong Web3 communities. Through my leadership roles across multiple blockchain initiatives, I continue to drive impact and innovation in the space. With a focus on education, collaboration, and practical experience, I aim to contribute to the growth and sustainability of blockchain adoption in Africa and beyond.

project.title: Emmo00 for OSS and Community Building
project.description:
I‚Äôve actively contributed to open-source, building tools that simplify fintech, blockchain, and developer workflows. I focus on making software more accessible while fostering a strong developer community through mentorship and education.  

### **Community Leadership**  

I actively lead and mentor developers through:  

- **Dev Team Lead ‚Äì Borderless Tech Club, UNN**: Driving tech initiatives, and mentoring upcoming developers.  Borderless Tech Club is a student-led and student-focused initiative at the University of Nigeria, Nsukka, dedicated to onboarding the next generation of individuals into areas like software development, content creation/marketing, design, and other interesting fields in the web3 and web2 space.  We are currently organizing "Cipher Sessions" here at UNN‚Äîan initiative designed to onboard individuals into Web3 and equip them with essential and relevant skills in the space, including smart contract development, UI/UX design, content creation, and more. I serve as the Solidity and smart contract development tutor for this program. [Community Page](https://x.com/Borderlessunn)

- **Technical Lead ‚Äì GDG UNN**: Coordinating hackathons, workshops, and technical events that bridge students and professional developers.  Google Developer Groups (GDG) UNN is a community backed by Google, focused on empowering developers with knowledge and resources to build impactful tech solutions. GDG UNN serves as a hub for developers to connect, learn, and grow in their careers while staying updated on the latest trends in technology. [Community Page](https://x.com/Borderlessunn)


### **Projects**  

- **M3tering Protocol Developer** ‚Äì Actively contributing to the **M3tering Protocol**, an open-source initiative for decentralized energy metering and data access. Currently building an **index for meter data**, making it easily accessible for developers looking to integrate M3tering data into their applications. [Project Page](https://m3tering.whynotswitch.com/)
- **[Usenevo](https://github.com/Emmo00/usenevo)** ‚Äì A crypto invoice manager that streamlines invoice creation, tracking, and payment in crypto.  
- **[Mock Paystack](https://github.com/Emmo00/mock-paystack-laravel)** ‚Äì A Laravel package that provides a mock API for Paystack, making testing seamless without real API calls.  

### **Content & Education**  

Beyond writing code, I share insights through articles covering software development, fintech, and blockchain. Some of my published work:  


- **[7 Facts You Didn‚Äôt Know About the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM)](https://paragraph.xyz/@nwaforemmanuel005gmail.com/7-facts-you-didnt-know-about-the-ethereum-virtual-machine-evm)** ‚Äì A deep dive into the inner workings of the EVM, revealing lesser-known details about how smart contracts execute.  
- **[Self-Guide for Deploying Laravel and React Applications on a VPS](https://dev.to/emmo00/self-guide-for-deploying-laravel-and-react-applications-on-a-vps-1o57)** ‚Äì A detailed walkthrough of setting up a VPS to deploy full-stack applications with Laravel and React.
- **[Learning a New Language/Framework](https://dev.to/emmo00/learning-a-new-languageframework-1ef7)** ‚Äì My experience adapting to an unfamiliar language and framework during an internship and strategies that helped me navigate the learning curve.  
- **[What is the Point of Using Recursive Functions?](https://dev.to/emmo00/what-is-the-point-of-using-recursive-functions-when-writing-code-2k4f)** ‚Äì Breaking down recursion in programming with practical examples and real-world use cases.  
- **[The Difference Between `||` and `??` in JavaScript](https://dev.to/emmo00/the-difference-between-and-in-javascript-3em3)** ‚Äì A comparison of JavaScript‚Äôs OR (`||`) and Nullish Coalescing (`??`) operators and when to use each.  
- **[How to Use Black and Pre-Commit for Auto Formatting in Python](https://dev.to/emmo00/how-to-setup-black-and-pre-commit-in-python-for-auto-text-formatting-on-commit-4kka)** ‚Äì A guide on setting up Black with pre-commit hooks to maintain consistent code formatting automatically.  
- **[Closures & Memoization](https://dev.to/emmo00/closures-memoisation-3gpp)** ‚Äì Explaining how closures work in JavaScript and how they enable memoization for performance optimization.  
- **[What Happens When You Type google.com in Your Browser and Press Enter?](https://medium.com/@nwaforemmanuel005/what-happens-when-you-type-google-com-in-your-browser-and-press-enter-327f22292b50)** ‚Äì A step-by-step breakdown of how the web works, from DNS resolution to page rendering.  

These writings help onboard developers into the open-source and blockchain space, breaking down complex ideas into practical insights.  


I‚Äôm committed to growing the open-source and Web3 ecosystem through education, collaboration, and hands-on contributions. Support from this grant will enable me to sustain these projects, create more learning opportunities, and push forward the adoption of open technologies.

- **[The Difference Between `||` and `??` in JavaScript](https://dev.to/emmo00/the-difference-between-and-in-javascript-3em3)** ‚Äì A comparison of JavaScript‚Äôs OR (`||`) and Nullish Coalescing (`??`) operators and when to use each.  
- **[How to Use Black and Pre-Commit for Auto Formatting in Python](https://dev.to/emmo00/how-to-setup-black-and-pre-commit-in-python-for-auto-text-formatting-on-commit-4kka)** ‚Äì A guide on setting up Black with pre-commit hooks to maintain consistent code formatting automatically.  
- **[Closures & Memoization](https://dev.to/emmo00/closures-memoisation-3gpp)** ‚Äì Explaining how closures work in JavaScript and how they enable memoization for performance optimization.  
- **[What Happens When You Type google.com in Your Browser and Press Enter?](https://medium.com/@nwaforemmanuel005/what-happens-when-you-type-google-com-in-your-browser-and-press-enter-327f22292b50)** ‚Äì A step-by-step breakdown of how the web works, from DNS resolution to page rendering.  

These writings help onboard developers into the open-source and blockchain space, breaking down complex ideas into practical insights.  


I‚Äôm committed to growing the open-source and Web3 ecosystem through education, collaboration, and hands-on contributions. Support from this grant will enable me to sustain these projects, create more learning opportunities, and push forward the adoption of open technologies.

project.title: BORDERLESS TECH HUB UNIZIK
project.description:
1. INTRODUCTION
Borderless Unizik is a Borderless Tech club established in Nnamdi Azikiwe University, Awka, Anambra, with a mission to empower students with knowledge and practical skills in Tech and Web3. Since its inception in 2023, we have hosted three physical meetups and several online sessions to educate students on blockchain technology, tech, and how to build Web3 projects. We have collaborated with notable blockchain and Web3 communities in Anambra, such as the Anambra Web3 Conference, Unizik Blockchain Lab, Bitcoin on Campus Meetup, Suioncampus Meetup, Creatiz, Women in Defi Anambra chapter, Apex Tech Hub and Anambra Techies. Our efforts have resulted in over ten students successfully graduating from the Borderless Cirpher program, where they acquired skills in Solidity, UI/UX design, data analysis, and web development.
To further our impact, we propose the establishment of a Tech Hub within Nnamdi Azikiwe University to serve as a central learning space for students interested in tech and blockchain.

2. PROJECT OBJECTIVES:

Establish a Tech Hub within Nnamdi Azikiwe University, providing students with a physical space for hands-on learning, collaboration, and mentorship in tech and Web3.
Enhance Blockchain and Tech Education by hosting regular workshops, hackathons, and training sessions.
Increase Community Engagement by expanding partnerships with local and global blockchain/Web3 communities.
Bridge the Knowledge Gap by offering structured programs in Solidity, UI/UX design, data analysis, cybersecurity, and other tech-related fields.
Foster Innovation and Startups by supporting student-led Web3 and tech projects through mentorship and incubation.

3. PROJECT SCOPE & IMPLEMENTATION:
Phase 1: Securing a Space for the Tech Hub
Partner with the university administration to allocate a dedicated space for the hub. Equip the hub with computers, internet access, and learning materials.
Design an operational structure, including scheduled training programs.

Phase 2: Training & Community Building
Organize weekly training sessions on blockchain development, smart contracts, and Web3 security.
Invite industry experts for mentorship and guest lectures. Host bi-monthly hackathons and bootcamps to encourage project development.

Phase 3: Expanding Impact & Sustainability
Strengthen collaborations with existing tech and blockchain communities. Launch a student-led project incubation program within the hub. Develop a system for membership and alumni engagement.

4. Our Impact:

Since our inception in 2023, we've:

Hosted 1 physical meetup and 2 watch parties to educate UNIZIK students on blockchain, tech, and Web3.

https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1808133739660079156?t=QJS7CYCUXhmPIq2_JLhhjg&s=19


https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1839805641382154742?t=nmngYJbXelrn2yJPncBVDg&s=


https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1853825915056205896?t=dhdoFVSPr4rv4K6O7W-4lg&s=19


https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1851570431246905750?t=J2G7p4PxuniRRCjsIrgGWA&s=19


Over 10 of our community members graduated from Borderless scholarship Cirpher session including our Tech club lead who graduated as a solidity developer. where they acquired skills in:
    - Solidity
    - UI/UX
    - Data analysis
    - Web design and development


https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1839805919447707668?t=y1-4zaVhFOv7W8hQJWc1-w&s=19

Success story.

https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1848691169749852185?t=CkkS45QO83nakBbl5M17bw&s=19


Our Tech club lead bagged the award of the 2nd Tech Lead of the year.

https://x.com/Cheric_Leo/status/1854615117423321553?t=F5T14maRfVhufjzFhEKQ9w&s=19


Partnered with blockchain and Web3 communities in Anambra State, including:
 Anambra Web3 Conference
 Unizik Blockchain Lab
 Bitcoin on Campus Meetup
Apex Hub
Women in Defi Anambra chapter
Anambra Techies. Etc.


https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1863647262229893172?t=BBE0XjSn8-UTSsxQbM5_Mg&s=19

https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1862051000573415809?t=ZcWHJS0zGLlrCW-R94EzBQ&s=19


https://x.com/Cheric_Leo/status/1855982750274044255?t=lp2KCU-eLxRUS0klm1YWmg&s=19



Provided online spaces for students to learn about Web3, tech, and blockchain.

https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1854591232959561989?t=JsBne0vYNONxdHfg-WHmiQ&s=19

https://x.com/Uniziktechclub/status/1863647262229893172?t=BBE0XjSn8-UTSsxQbM5_Mg&s=19



5. EXPECTED OUTCOMES;
A full  operational Tech Hub within the university.
At least 100+ students trained in blockchain, Web3, and general tech skills annually.
Increased student participation in local and global hackathons.
Stronger partnerships with leading blockchain communities and companies.
Support for student-led blockchain and tech startups.

6. REQUIRED RESOURCES:
A dedicated space within the university.
Laptops, internet access, and training materials.
Sponsorship and funding from tech and blockchain companies.
Support from industry experts and university lecturers.

 7. GRANT REQUEST & USE OF FUNDS:

We're seeking funding to establish a Tech hub: Borderless Tech Hub Unizik  because it will  be a game-changer for students, fostering innovation, collaboration, and real-world tech skills. This hub will empower the next generation of blockchain and tech leaders.

answers.question: Which B<>rder/ess University Web3 Tech Club are you affiliated with and state the web3 Tech Club Leads name?

answers.answer:
My name is Esthe Peter Tom, I am a Law student at the University of Port Harcourt where I learned my Tech Skills as early as my First year in the University.

In my course of exploring Tech as a Digital Marketer, Content Writer and a sought after Social Media Manager, I came in contact with #Web3 and Blockchain Technologies. I was onboarded into Web3 in the Borderless Web3 Community. Since then, I have been an active Web3: Educator, Content Creator, Social Media Manager, and a Web3 Pressman.

I am proposing the ‚ÄòTheNewbiesCorner (TNC)‚Äô project, a Web3/Tech educational project designed to help students seamlessly transition into Tech and Web3. It simplifies complex Web3 concepts, breaking them down like explaining to a baby. Through a structured website, it provides free educational videos, explainers, workbooks, and eBooks. NewbiesCorner also supports Web2 professionals in integrating Web3 into their fields or transitioning to Web3. With a focus on simplicity , accessibility and clarity, it ensures that students from non-tech backgrounds can easily understand and leverage Web3 for their careers.

### My Web3 Education and Onboarding Activities
After my onboarding, I started off leading the Content Writing Team for Borderless 2.0. Afterwards I progressed to contribute to the Web3 ecosystem and onboarding Newbies at CRYPTOSMART, where we teach and help newbies to get started on their Web3 journey. I do this by hosting spaces, here's a few link to the spaces I hosted:

- Guarding Against Crypto Scams: Securing your Wallets and Investments: >https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1766177128515576316?s=46
-  Creating Wealth: Utilizing Airdrops and Wallets
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1758567650307834181?s=46
-  Leveraging Defi Opportunities in Africa:  >https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1LyxBnknnZPxN

# Below are links to a few Long form contents I have written to Educate Newbies:
- 3 Crypto Scams you should Avoid:
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1761016202522964305?s=46
- What to Look out for before buying your first Cryptocurrency: >https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1846882571877052815?s=46
- Rules of Technical Analysis: >https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1772580804360609838?s=46

- # Here's a link to a Web3 Trivia I came up with:
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1844443262666592602?s=46

- # Here's another link to some Web3 memes I created:
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1756004371656053171?s=46
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1832011727304638911?s=46



### My Web3 Contribution as a Tech Club Lead @Borderless Tech Club, Uniport.
I became the Club Lead for my University; Borderless Tech Club Uniport. I started hosting events and activities targeted towards educating, onboarding and establishing newbies in the Web3 Ecosystem.
I created our Social Media Page and I lead a team of students to run the activities of our club effectively.

- Here's a Web3 onboarding session by Arbitrum of which I volunteered as an Usher along my other Tech club members: >https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1771779730397638782?s=46
- As a result oriented Tech Lead, I planned this Picnic for my Community members to evaluate our work in the Web3 Space and in our studies: >https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1799532563238695000?s=46
- During Borderless3.0, I was available as a Tech Lead, to plan and mobilize UNIPORT Students to the venue of the event as well as ensuring their safety back to their various destinations.
- This is a Web3 Snack Weekend Onboard session at UNIPORT, where I onboarded Newbies and discussed our respective progress in Web3:>https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1901285979807166817?s=46

### Onboarding and Educating Newbies at Web3 Events. 

# Despite Academic engagement, I go all out on the Web3 Ecosystem. My passion for Web3 made it possible to join in Borderless3.0 Preparations simultaneously with my LLB 3 Exams.

- ## My active participation in Web3 and my passion to onboard newbies far and near gave birth to Borderless Tech Club, Kano: https://x.com/borderless_kano?s=21
Here's another post I made after our Borderless3.0 Planning Committee meeting: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1844103567671689619?s=46
- Here's a GM post I made about Borderless3.0 before going for my exams in the morning: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1846066000539550058?s=46
-# I volunteered at the Gitcoin booth alongside Ifeanyi (Peejay), educating newbies on Public Goods, Guiding them to make their first donations and onboarding them to Web3: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1852413490360631640?s=46
- Here is a Web3 onboarding and publicity session for Borderless3.0 I held in my school for my Tech Club: >https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1847499569682125092?s=46
- I was always active for the Community Calls, sharing my little ideas and publicizing our Web3 Event to facilitate a seamless boarding experience for newbies: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1827293842225176582?s=46
- ## I was one of the Panelists at Borderless3.0 where I spoke about the Borderless Tech Clubs as an institution for Web3 mass Education, adoption and career development, highlighting the onboarding work we do at Borderless Tech Club, UNIPORT.
- I was an active member of the Content Writing Team, where I proofread and edited contents before posting. I also worked in the  Social Media Team.
- This is a link to a beautiful Borderless3.0 video I recorded. It's a Concept I came up with, I wrote the script but my roommate was not able to record a video of me so I directed her to present and shot this video of her: >https://x.com/borderlessdev/status/1848395944728858897?s=46
- As a Web3 enthusiast committed to Web3 Education and onboarding, I was one of the guest spears at ‚ÄòShe Builds on Near‚Äô Summit: where I spoke on Web3 adoption in Nigeria and practical ways to adopt Web3 in our everyday life: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1792933465895104519?s=46

# Creating Educational Content as a Web3 Writer
Additionally, I have the opportunity to contribute to the Web3 Ecosystem as a pressman @Crispy_craps, where I write converting and viral Web3 news headlines about different Web3 Ecosystems. Below are links to a few of my viral posts:

- This post has over 24,000 views: >https://x.com/crispy_craps/status/1892260837215072570?s=46
- This post has over 44k views, 1k likes and 160 reposts: >https://x.com/crispy_craps/status/1893963326335397937?s=46
- This post has over 66,000 views >https://x.com/crispy_craps/status/1895848686741307627?s=46

## Also, as a Web3 Pressman, I announce Opportunities, Bounties, Projects and Grants  in Web3 at Byteonchainnews (@byteonchain). I also update the Web3 Communities on Public Goods.
- Here's an anticipation post I made about the GG23 Rounds: >https://x.com/byteonchain/status/1901249394080350500?s=46
- Here's a viral content I created on Byteonchain about Web3 Content Creators Contest Bounty for Web3 Contributors. This video has over 23,000 views, 542 likes, 156 retweets and 183 comments: >https://x.com/byteonchain/status/1899036895453086207?s=46

### Furthermore, as a way of contributing to Web3 education, I created a Web3 Writing Hub where I occasionally educate newbies on Web3 Writing. 
- This is a link to one of the participants content after our first training last year December: >https://x.com/theweb3athlete/status/1891592684688548221?s=46
- This is a link to my First Web3 Video content, where I researched and explained in details LiskHQ Blockchain and their Superchain launch on @Optimism Opstack: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1773809544461783400?s=46
- I also wrote an educational article on Medium about the Near Protocol and Build on Near Program: https://medium.com/@estherpetertom/if-you-were-elsa-what-will-you-do-0458af0219a1

### Web3 Contribution in my University 
I'm popularly known as ‚ÄòThe Web3 Lawyer‚Äô or ‚ÄòTech Lawyer‚Äô in my faculty. This is as a result of the mass Web3 education, consultation and clarification I do for my coursemates, Junior and Senior Colleagues. Also, a few of my onboarded colleagues have moved from Newbies to employees in the Web3 Sector. Here's a few of them:
- Meet Habiba, my coursemate whom I onboarded as a newbie last year and taught her Content Writing. She's currently a Writer on the Web3 Space: >https://ng.linkedin.com/in/habiba-aruwa-353178338?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_mweb&utm_campaign=share_via&utm_content=profile
- Meet Stella, a coursemate I onboarded her last year and taught her social Media Management, she is now a Virtual Assistant in the Web3 Space: >https://x.com/ma_ris_st_el_la?s=21
- Meet Jessica my roommate in the University. I onboarded her to Web3, she's now a Web3 UI/UX Designer: >https://x.com/borderlessdev/status/1848395944728858897?s=46

# Despite Academic engagement, I go all out on the Web3 Ecosystem. My passion for Web3 made it possible to join in Borderless3.0 Preparations simultaneously with my LLB 3 Exams.

- ## My active participation in Web3 and my passion to onboard newbies far and near gave birth to Borderless Tech Club, Kano: https://x.com/borderless_kano?s=21
Here's another post I made after our Borderless3.0 Planning Committee meeting: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1844103567671689619?s=46
- Here's a GM post I made about Borderless3.0 before going for my exams in the morning: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1846066000539550058?s=46
-# I volunteered at the Gitcoin booth alongside Ifeanyi (Peejay), educating newbies on Public Goods, Guiding them to make their first donations and onboarding them to Web3: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1852413490360631640?s=46
- Here is a Web3 onboarding and publicity session for Borderless3.0 I held in my school for my Tech Club: >https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1847499569682125092?s=46
- I was always active for the Community Calls, sharing my little ideas and publicizing our Web3 Event to facilitate a seamless boarding experience for newbies: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1827293842225176582?s=46
- ## I was one of the Panelists at Borderless3.0 where I spoke about the Borderless Tech Clubs as an institution for Web3 mass Education, adoption and career development, highlighting the onboarding work we do at Borderless Tech Club, UNIPORT.
- I was an active member of the Content Writing Team, where I proofread and edited contents before posting. I also worked in the  Social Media Team.
- This is a link to a beautiful Borderless3.0 video I recorded. It's a Concept I came up with, I wrote the script but my roommate was not able to record a video of me so I directed her to present and shot this video of her: >https://x.com/borderlessdev/status/1848395944728858897?s=46
- As a Web3 enthusiast committed to Web3 Education and onboarding, I was one of the guest spears at ‚ÄòShe Builds on Near‚Äô Summit: where I spoke on Web3 adoption in Nigeria and practical ways to adopt Web3 in our everyday life: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1792933465895104519?s=46

# Creating Educational Content as a Web3 Writer
Additionally, I have the opportunity to contribute to the Web3 Ecosystem as a pressman @Crispy_craps, where I write converting and viral Web3 news headlines about different Web3 Ecosystems. Below are links to a few of my viral posts:

- This post has over 24,000 views: >https://x.com/crispy_craps/status/1892260837215072570?s=46
- This post has over 44k views, 1k likes and 160 reposts: >https://x.com/crispy_craps/status/1893963326335397937?s=46
- This post has over 66,000 views >https://x.com/crispy_craps/status/1895848686741307627?s=46

## Also, as a Web3 Pressman, I announce Opportunities, Bounties, Projects and Grants  in Web3 at Byteonchainnews (@byteonchain). I also update the Web3 Communities on Public Goods.
- Here's an anticipation post I made about the GG23 Rounds: >https://x.com/byteonchain/status/1901249394080350500?s=46
- Here's a viral content I created on Byteonchain about Web3 Content Creators Contest Bounty for Web3 Contributors. This video has over 23,000 views, 542 likes, 156 retweets and 183 comments: >https://x.com/byteonchain/status/1899036895453086207?s=46

### Furthermore, as a way of contributing to Web3 education, I created a Web3 Writing Hub where I occasionally educate newbies on Web3 Writing. 
- This is a link to one of the participants content after our first training last year December: >https://x.com/theweb3athlete/status/1891592684688548221?s=46
- This is a link to my First Web3 Video content, where I researched and explained in details LiskHQ Blockchain and their Superchain launch on @Optimism Opstack: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1773809544461783400?s=46
- I also wrote an educational article on Medium about the Near Protocol and Build on Near Program: https://medium.com/@estherpetertom/if-you-were-elsa-what-will-you-do-0458af0219a1

### Web3 Contribution in my University 
I'm popularly known as ‚ÄòThe Web3 Lawyer‚Äô or ‚ÄòTech Lawyer‚Äô in my faculty. This is as a result of the mass Web3 education, consultation and clarification I do for my coursemates, Junior and Senior Colleagues. Also, a few of my onboarded colleagues have moved from Newbies to employees in the Web3 Sector. Here's a few of them:
- Meet Habiba, my coursemate whom I onboarded as a newbie last year and taught her Content Writing. She's currently a Writer on the Web3 Space: >https://ng.linkedin.com/in/habiba-aruwa-353178338?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_mweb&utm_campaign=share_via&utm_content=profile
- Meet Stella, a coursemate I onboarded her last year and taught her social Media Management, she is now a Virtual Assistant in the Web3 Space: >https://x.com/ma_ris_st_el_la?s=21
- Meet Jessica my roommate in the University. I onboarded her to Web3, she's now a Web3 UI/UX Designer: >https://x.com/borderlessdev/status/1848395944728858897?s=46

project.title: THE NEWBIE'S CORNER
project.description:
### ABOUT
My name is Esthe Peter Tom, I am a Law student at the University of Port Harcourt where I learned my Tech Skills as early as my First year in the University.

In my course of exploring Tech as a Digital Marketer, Content Writer and a sought after Social Media Manager, I came in contact with #Web3 and Blockchain Technologies. I was onboarded into Web3 in the Borderless Web3 Community. Since then, I have been an active Web3: Educator, Content Creator, Social Media Manager, and a Web3 Pressman.

I present the ‚ÄòTheNewbiesCorner (TNC)‚Äô project, a Web3/Tech educational project designed to help students seamlessly transition into Tech and Web3. It simplifies complex Web3 concepts, breaking them down like explaining to a baby. Through a structured website, it provides free educational videos, explainers, workbooks, and eBooks. NewbiesCorner also supports Web2 professionals in integrating Web3 into their fields or transitioning to Web3. With a focus on simplicity , accessibility and clarity, it ensures that students from non-tech backgrounds can easily understand and leverage Web3 for their careers.

### PROJECT OBJECTIVES
- Establish an Accessible Learning Platform by developing a structured website that provides easy-to-understand Web3, tech and public goods educational videos, explainers, workbooks, and eBooks for free.
- Simplify Web3 and public goods Education by breaking down complex Web3 concepts and terminologies in a way that even complete beginners can understand, making the transition seamless.
- Support Web2 to Web3 Transition by creating tailored content that helps Web2 professionals and tech talents navigate and integrate into the Web3 space.
- Increase Web3 Adoption by providing step-by-step onboarding resources that make it easy for newcomers to enter and thrive in the Web3 ecosystem.
- Enhance Community Engagement by fostering a network of learners and mentors who can support and guide newcomers through their tech and Web3 journey.
- Empower Newbies for Growth by equipping them with the foundational knowledge and skills needed to explore career opportunities in Web3 and technology.

### PROJECT SCOPE & IMPLEMENTATION
# Phase 1: Resource Acquisition & Platform Development
- Secure a laptop and projector for content creation, presentations, and training sessions.
- Acquire Web3 merchandise (e.g., branded shirts, stickers, and accessories) to boost awareness and engagement.
- Ensure fast and secure internet access to support seamless online learning and content delivery.
- Develop a structured website with educational videos, explainers, workbooks, and eBooks tailored for Law, Medical, and other professional students.
- Publish educational materials, including Web3 explainers, workbooks, and eBooks, to provide structured learning resources for students.

# Phase 2: Training & Community Onboarding
- Organize weekly training sessions breaking down Web3 concepts and their applications in law, healthcare, and professional industries.
- Host interactive explainer sessions that simplify blockchain, smart contracts, and decentralized applications for non-tech students.
- Conduct virtual and physical onboarding sessions to help students transition from Web2 to Web3 in the easiest way possible.
- Partner with Web3 industry experts to provide mentorship and career guidance to students exploring Web3 opportunities.

# Phase 3: Scaling & Sustainability
- Establish strategic partnerships with Web3 communities, blockchain organizations, and university faculties.
- Distribute and promote published educational materials (eBooks, workbooks, and video explainers) to ensure continuous learning beyond live sessions.
Implement a membership and alumni network to track progress and support students‚Äô long-term growth in Web3.


### My Web3 Education and Onboarding Activities
After my onboarding, I started off leading the Content Writing Team for Borderless 2.0. Afterwards I progressed to contribute to the Web3 ecosystem and onboarding Newbies at CRYPTOSMART, where we teach and help newbies to get started on their Web3 journey. I do this by hosting spaces, here's a few link to the spaces I hosted:

- Guarding Against Crypto Scams: Securing your Wallets and Investments: >https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1766177128515576316?s=46
-  Creating Wealth: Utilizing Airdrops and Wallets
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1758567650307834181?s=46
-  Leveraging Defi Opportunities in Africa:  >https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1LyxBnknnZPxN

# Below are links to a few Long form contents I have written to Educate Newbies:
- 3 Crypto Scams you should Avoid:
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1761016202522964305?s=46
- What to Look out for before buying your first Cryptocurrency: >https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1846882571877052815?s=46
- Rules of Technical Analysis: >https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1772580804360609838?s=46

- Here's a link to a Web3 Trivia I came up with:
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1844443262666592602?s=46

- # Here's another link to some Web3 memes I created:
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1756004371656053171?s=46
>https://x.com/cryptosmartnow/status/1832011727304638911?s=46



### My Web3 Contribution as a Tech Club Lead @Borderless Tech Club, Uniport.
I became the Club Lead for my University; Borderless Tech Club Uniport. I started hosting events and activities targeted towards educating, onboarding and establishing newbies in the Web3 Ecosystem.
I created our Social Media Page and I lead a team of students to run the activities of our club effectively.

- Here's a Web3 onboarding session by Arbitrum of which I volunteered as an Usher along my other Tech club members: >https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1771779730397638782?s=46
- As a result oriented Tech Lead, I planned this Picnic for my Community members to evaluate our work in the Web3 Space and in our studies: >https://x.com/borderless_ph/status/1799532563238695000?s=46
- During Borderless3.0, I was available as a Tech Lead, to plan and mobilize UNIPORT Students to the venue of the event as well as ensuring their safety back to their various destinations.
- This is a Web3 Snack Weekend Onboard session at UNIPORT, where I onboarded Newbies and discussed our respective progress in Web3:>https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1901285979807166817?s=46



### Onboarding and Educating Newbies at Web3 Events. 

# Despite Academic engagement, I go all out on the Web3 Ecosystem. My passion for Web3 made it possible to join in Borderless3.0 Preparations simultaneously with my LLB 3 Exams.

- # My active participation in Web3 and my passion to onboard newbies far and near gave birth to Borderless Tech Club, Kano: https://x.com/borderless_kano?s=21

- I was always active for the Community Calls, sharing my little ideas and publicizing our Web3 Event to facilitate a seamless boarding experience for newbies: >https://x.com/estherpeter_/status/1827293842225176582?s=46
- # I was one of the Panelists at Borderless3.0 where I spoke about the Borderless Tech Clubs as an institution for Web3 mass Education, adoption and career development, highlighting the onboarding work we do at Borderless Tech Club, UNIPORT.
- I was an active member of the Content Writing Team, where I proofread and edited contents before posting. I also worked in the  Social Media Team.

answers.answer:
I'm Praise Ohwodiasa (praizohwos.base.eth), and teaching has always been second nature to me. I started as a tutor in my teenage years and later transitioned into digital education when I discovered the MMO space.

That passion for teaching led me to create educational Web3 content‚Äîbreaking down complex concepts into digestible pieces.

 MY WEB3 JOURNEY

I began with written content, crafting educational threads that simplified tough Web3 topics. One of my most notable pieces is a breakdown of DePINs, explaining the concept in an engaging and accessible way. 
- DePIN thread: https://x.com/OhwodiasaPraise/status/1880228344643613037?t=1-f9BNQpAGjbdiZM50L5qA&s=08


Beyond writing, I hosted Twitter Spaces to guide beginners in their Web3 journeys, including 'Technical Writing 101,' where my guest and I provided mentorship for those serious about Web3 technical writing. 

- Technical Writing 101 space: https://x.com/OhwodiasaPraise/status/1870179018206511525?t=zmybeE94yNUxkVm1AhfW_Q&s=08

GOING ALL IN ON BASE üîµ

In Q4 2024, I made a strategic decision to focus exclusively on Base. From then on, I leveled up my content game, expanding into both written and video formats while becoming a vocal advocate for Base.

NOTABLE CONTRIBUTIONS:

- Educating on EgoBlox:
Wrote an article explaining how EgoBlox enables seamless crypto payments for essentials using Base and stablecoins like USDC and DAI.

  - Article: https://paragraph.xyz/@praizohwos.base.eth/egoblox-pay-your-bills-smarter-with-crypto


-Getting Started on Base Ep. 1:
Engaged and educated 30+ Web3 newbies on how to enter the Base ecosystem and leverage their skills.

  - Space: https://x.com/i/spaces/1BdGYEAAvLvGX


- Base University Onboarding Tour:
Launched a university tour in January, introducing students to Web3 through interactive games and crypto incentives.

  - Episode 1: 36,000+ views, 1,300+ impressions - https://x.com/OhwodiasaPraise/status/1886378922947772860


  - Episode 2 (February): 8,000 views, 500+ impressions - https://x.com/OhwodiasaPraise/status/1897348268243513793?t=h9g3DKJ0tJ6W3iEsW8zS0w&s=19


- Zora Tutorial:
Created a step-by-step video guide on registering and minting content on Zora.

  - Video: https://x.com/OhwodiasaPraise/status/1898063054622843218?t=3Tc9xxuv6lugwzPxfoBE5w&s=19


COMMUNITY BUILDING & IMPACT:

I don‚Äôt just onboard people and leave them hanging‚ÄîI built a community to ensure continuous learning, networking, and retention.

- Founded Based Ones, an educational community supporting new Web3 users.


- Hosted a Twitter Space for Education, fostering discussions on onboarding and skill-building.

  - Space: https://x.com/BasedOnes_/status/1900262460549984266?t=niYDUD4sBYpYZ7F5n7O-5A&s=19


- Successfully onboarded new users onto Warpcast, helping them integrate into the Web3 ecosystem.

  - Warpcast onboarding: https://warpcast.com/clev/0x42308391


- Recognized by Base, who reached out to appreciate my work and even followed me on X.

ADDITIONAL WEB3 CONTRIBUTIONSüåç

- Led the Borderless 3.0 Newsletter Team, contributing to 1,000+ event registrations. Our department won a Top Department award.

  - Award post: https://x.com/OhwodiasaPraise/status/1853760742886969344?t=G5YjVnXKsZg1xkWmMTFAnw&s=19


- Supported event planning, social media, and content teams, driving engagement through video & written content.


- Graphics Contributions:
Designed merch (t-shirts & hoodies) for the event, earning recognition as the #2 Graphics Designer of the Year.

Award Post: https://x.com/OhwodiasaPraise/status/1853760742886969344?t=G5YjVnXKsZg1xkWmMTFAnw&s=19

- Created video content promoting Borderless 3.0, boosting awareness and attendance.

  - Promo video: https://x.com/BorderlessDev/status/1852242269165769145?t=2bCKofFz65XuOK73yi7mQQ&s=19


- Hosted a free copywriting class for the Borderless community, teaching the fundamentals of Web3 copywriting.

  - Class post: https://x.com/favorchinyeree/status/1741113129113715134?t=uQcKrzIRqapkqAvQpo5mZQ&s=19


  - Student feedback: https://x.com/favorchinyeree/status/1741115765716107540?t=1IPanK1u97qy50a0NEC6jg&s=19

 Next Phase Plan - 

 A WEB3 ONBOARDING CONFERENCE:

In the second quarter, I plan on hosting an onboarding conference where I'll get to onboard 100 people onto Web3.

 MARKETING STRATEGY:

The plan is to target young university students because they have untapped potential, and I already have a rapport with some departmental heads across various universities. I'll go through these department heads, visit at least 10 departments across 4 universities, and talk to them about the conference. Virtual sensitization will be done across these departments, where the link for registration will be sent to their department groups/forums. From there, I'll keep them engaged through emails as they sign up for the conference.

It is important to note that I have prior experience in marketing through emails, content, and other forms, as I was the head of the newsletter team and a part of the content, social media, and planning teams for Borderless 3.0. I played a vital part in Borderless 3.0's success. 

And, of course, I won't be doing this alone.

I have close ties with the chairman of the Borderless 3.0 event, and I'll be working closely with him to ensure everything is done right. I already have a list of speakers on paper (I reached out to one, and he accepted to come speak at the conference when it's time)‚Äîspeakers with vast experience across the Web3 space.

The idea is: Web3 for everyone‚Äîdevs, content creators, and artists. Web3 is more than trading and doing airdrops, and this conference will help educate the attendees on this truth, demystify some of its complex concepts, and onboard some really exciting and talented young people into Web3.


From breaking down Web3 concepts to designing viral onboarding experiences, I‚Äôm fully committed to pushing Web3 adoption forward. üöÄ

answers.answer:
Project Summary:
This program seeks to educate and engage at least 100 designers on the significance of 2D and 3D animation in the Web3 space. Through structured workshops, hands-on projects, and mentorship, our goal is to transition at least 20 of these designers into active animation creators for Web3 applications, NFTs, and metaverse experiences.

Project Objectives:
1. Education & Awareness: Conduct workshops that introduce designers to the role of 2D and 3D animation in Web3, covering blockchain technology, NFTs, and decentralized content creation.
2. Skill Development: Provide training on animation tools such as Blender, After Effects, and Unity, with a focus on their application in Web3 projects.
3. Practical Engagement: Organize hands-on activities where participants create and showcase animations suitable for NFT projects, decentralized gaming, and the metaverse.
4. Community & Networking: Establish a support system for designers to collaborate, share insights, and explore opportunities in the Web3 animation industry.
5. Recruitment & Retention: Aim to have at least 20 designers actively engaged in animation creation for Web3 platforms by the end of the program.

Implementation Plan:

Phase 1: Recruitment & Outreach (Month 1-2)  
- Promote the program through social media, Web3 communities, and design networks.
- Host an introductory webinar to attract participants.

Phase 2: Educational Workshops (Month 3-4)
- Conduct virtual and in-person sessions on Web3 fundamentals and animation techniques.
- Bring in industry experts to discuss real-world applications and trends.

Phase 3: Hands-on Training (Month 5-6)
- Assign practical projects such as NFT animation creation, Web3 advertisements, and metaverse assets.
- Provide mentorship and feedback through industry professionals.

Phase 4: Showcase & Integration (Month 7-8)
- Host an exhibition where participants present their projects.
- Facilitate networking opportunities with Web3 companies and investors.
- Select top projects for further development and potential funding.

Expected Outcomes:
- 100 designers will gain knowledge on the importance of animation in Web3.
- 20+ designers will actively engage in animation creation for Web3 applications.
- A sustainable community of Web3 animation creators will be established.

Conclusion:
This initiative is designed to bridge the gap between traditional design and Web3 animation, fostering a new generation of skilled creators. Your support will enable us to educate, train, and launch designers into the evolving world of Web3 animation.
